name: miawalks
text: soo good for a glossy eye look! super affordable and long lasting❤️

name: Katalimar
title: If you are considering trying this, just buy it!
text: I cannot express how amazing this product is. I've used this predominantly as an eye pigment. it doesnt transfer or crease all day. You use very little product for great colour payoff and coverage. This is the perfect colour for an everyday look. And moreover, you get a lot of product for the price.

name: Tylerthecreativ
title: Disappointed
text: Was looking for something easy to apply on the go but the formula is sticky and temperamental. Unfortunately it transfers and is patchy.

name: nano221
text: I put highlighter on my eyes for a look and used this as a primer because its tacky. Gave me a beautiful shine. Tried to use it as a lip gloss but it absorbed super fast.

name: inspiritviki
title: Beautiful formula, terrible packaging...
text: I just wrote a 5-stars review last week for this product and one week later, the product has dried out at the tip applicator, so no product can come out. I tried to squeeze the product out and the whole tube exploded on me, leaving glitters ALL OVER MY ROOM. This is just not worth it, no matter how pretty the formula is. The formula is pretty much waterproof, so it was so difficult cleaning up the mess from the explosion. Until Danessa updates the packaging, I don't think I will pick up this product. Unfortunately, I had to return the exploded tube and I love the color :(

name: rdel123
text:
Long lasting and doesn't budge once dried down.

3 stars because the glitter particles are bigger than I wanted. The color is very silver, very pigmented with big glitter particles.

The matte ones are great and pigmented, so I prefer the matte. I don't recommend the glitter ones if you were wanting smaller glitter particles. 

This would be great for looks where you wanted to make a glitter-packed look where this is the main actor. 

Not great for highlighting nor lightly using this to top up your eyes, at least for me, where smaller glitter would work better.

name: janski
title: Beautiful product.
text: This is a beautiful product and I love the way that it goes on, however the glitter in it fell into my eyes. I would definitely order one of the matte ones and I would definitely order one of the shines. I am having to return the glitter or metallic. If you use it on your cheeks it would be fine but if you can’t wear glitter near your eyes then I would not recommend it for eyeshadow.

name: Stephanieh1980
title: Sweet!!
text: These are amazing! The foils are a little harder to work with than the matte formula, but beautiful nonetheless:) Great quality, super pigmented! A little more tacky feeling than the mattes. Im also wearing plum wine shade in my crease

name: KatieandJenny
title: HATED THIS
text: I don’t know what I was expecting but it was NOT this. Very sticky, felt like my eyelids were stuck open. Patchy application, I couldn’t get it to lay on evenly, there was literally patches where product wouldn’t stick down. It’s full on glitter so WAY too much for every day wear. And then when I was removing it, the glitter scrapes against your skin and is actually uncomfortable. I never write reviews. But this needed a review.

name: RedPandaONE
text: This was intended for eyeliner as I wanted something budge-proof and with enough product where it would not dry out in 2 weeks.  I did get a lot of product! *But* this does not work well for lining your eyes as it will smudge, transfer and fade.  The colour ( in 'Blackout') isn't deep enough black for me but I can make it work by using it very sparingly and by drawing thin lines.  Don't even think of trying it in your waterlines.  If you want something for an easy smoky eye, then this is great for that.

name: Stephanieh1980
title: Crazy Good!!
text: OMG! This stuff is amazing! I have only used this matte formula so far (I bought 3 shades) Crazy pigmented and amazing color payoff!! I only needed the tiniest bit (smaller than a grain of rice to do both eyes) It was a bit tricky at first, but I managed just fine. Doesn't feel heavy or sticky. No creasing or movement. Need an oil based remover to get it off because this doesn't budge. I immediately purchased 2 more! Fantastic!!

name: charbeen
title: Oooh pretty
text: Whoa so pigmented!! A little goes a long way.  Used it as a topper and enjoyed it .  Will have to use it a few more times but quite enjoy the effect . This will probably last me forever as I used only a dot of product to do both eyes

name: MarinaOweis
text:
Wasn’t sparkly enough after it dried down it looked very dull 
I had to return unfortunately 
Not worth the hype at least this shade

name: Emxgosselin
title: Love it!
text: I love this gloss! I’ve been wanting a lid gloss for a while and this one is great. Something about a glossy lid is just *chefs kiss* beautiful. Only thing I would say is make sure this is the last step on your eye make up. Even after lashes. I went to put on lashes after applying and could not for the life of me get them to stick. Makes sense now that I think about it but yeah. Last step in your eye make up and you will look stunninggg

name: inspiritviki
title: Jewelz!
text:
Jewelz is so glittery and pretty! Very fine glitter, not chuncky glitters. So far I've used it twice and the lasting power on my lids (and hand, when swatched) is amazing, truly waterproof. Very special shade and I'd totally recommend this. 

I've read reviews that this dries out quickly so I hope that's not the case.

name: inspiritviki
title: Celebration
text: I was watching an influencer who recommended the Danessa Myricks Colorfix Pigment in Celebration so I bought it on a whim. Celebration is a very pretty chestnut brown but it is supposed to be metallic, but I fail to see any metallic at all. There are tiny flecks of shimmery fine glitters within the formula, it is not completely matte, however, i won't call it metallic. I have powder shadows that are more metallic than this. I'm not sure if this shade justify the $18 price tag since I find it to be pretty ordinary. However, I swatched this on my hand and then tried to wash my hand a few minutes later and the formula would not budge, which is means this is quite long-wearing. In any case, I don't really recommend the shade Celebration. You probably own a better metallic brown shade in your collection already.

name: lharvz
title: long lasting + great texture
text: This product is remarkable!! It really stays in place and the glitter doesn’t have any chunky texture to it. Even works on lips (I mean idk why you would want glitter lips but if you need them this works)

name: Andyxoxo
title: Beautiful product bad packaging
text: The product is 5 stars but the packaging is a huge fail. After a couple times using it, I went to apply from the tube to my finger tip, barely applied any pressure to the tube and the product exploded out. Wasted most of the product. Wish it had a tiny doe foot applicator inside to get to the product instead of a squeeze tube. Probably won’t repurchase unless packaging is changed. There are so many glitters on the market with better packaging.

name: Rsy7
text: If you are trying to use this as an eyeliner do not bother. It's not high in pigment for an eyeliner and is just very messy and goes everywhere. I do not recommend whatsoever for eyeliner.

name: Denetnet1
text: Easy to work with, great pigment! My only concern is the shelf life of the product. My purple one is drying out and I purchased 3-4 months ago!

name: marissammm
title: I’m so glad I bought this
text: This is seriously so amazing. I use it over my caviar sticks when I want a more glittery look on my eyes and it really delivers! The color is gorgeous duochrome and it stays all day long until I take it off. The fact that this can be used on lips and cheeks as well just blows my mind, this color makes a great highlighter in a pink and I also put it on my lips for lipstick recently and it looked shimmery and amazing! Then I tried it under a pink balm and the effect was a subtle glow. Honestly I just wish Sephora carried their whole line of colors so I could try the neon for the summer and get the rest of the foil colors.

name: foren6
text: I tried this after watching a few reviews on YouTube. This is the perfect one swipe shadow and go! Gives the perfect amount of color and blends beautifully. I’ve only worn it on my eyes so far but I’m in love! I already ordered another one in the color Alien. Can’t wait for it to arrive!

name: losan8
text: oh boy where do i begin. i really wanted to love it. it’s super dry, matte and it doesn’t blend good at all. def don’t recommend.

name: AliLebegue86
title: Beautiful color, but it dries really fast
text: Really beautiful color, and stays put. But it dries really really fast so you have to be quick. I'm going to keep it, but probably won't buy it another color

name: lizbg
title: it’s an okay product
text: I thought this product was going to look more like a gel type on the lid. It’s a regular metallic/glittery shadow. It doesn’t have any fallout. But not what I’m looking for. It dries down quickly so work it quickly onto the skin. If I didn’t have so many other similar products I would have kept it and given it a four. But because I thought it was more cream/bell like it’s a three for me. It says it’s a cream pigment which I understand it looks it when you squeeze the bottle on have it on the finger but once it glides on the skin (eyelid for me) it dries down like a dry powder. I would recommend it if you don’t have a big collection of this color.

name: alyciamedina
title: THE. BEST!!!
text: This product is so so so underrated, like it deserves ALL the hype. SO stunning, so easy to use and it lasts ALL FREAKIN DAY!!! What more could I ask for?! I need them all!! This is an insanely beautiful product, just try it you won’t regret it

name: Meggg06
text: Great colour and great consistency. Doesn’t crease and lasts pretty long on me. One thing is that it gets hard to squeeze out something. Maybe it is because the opening is clogged somehow.

name: misslovesdogs
title: loveee
text: obsessed. love how it comes out and will buy more!!!

name: emma1689
title: GORGEOUS
text: LOVE this product, i am buying more shades! Looks so pretty

name: AnnePaige
text: I love the color! It was so pretty! However, no matter what I did, it never felt fully dry. My eyelids constantly kept sticking. I used a primer and setting spray but I would have to use another eyeshadow or something to make it stop sticking which covered the color. So this was a waste of money for me. But I do want to add that I have very hooded eyelids and that could have been a factor. But for me, this is a no.

name: 1254Jessica
title: Glitter explosion
text: Great product, the tube clogged though in the first week! When i squeezed the tube the liquid glitter E X P L O D E D all over my bathroom, everything everything covered in glitter and all my product gone.. I know how to use a tube lol, this seems like a flaw to me.

name: michb
title: transfer proof magic
text: Does. Not. Budge. This one is glittery and blends nicely with my medium skin tone. No glitter fall out. I have numerous shades, but only use them on my eyes. They would be too drying for my lips, so check out the shiny/glaze ones for lips.

name: MAKEUPFOREVERFL
title: a must-have
text: smooth blend- beautiful color.  I've applied with both fingers and brush. a little goes a very long way.

name: buttplug
title: smooth! long lasting! darker than picture!
text:
The product is incredibly smooth wearing, stays on like a tattoo, doesn't seem to crease unless really piling on 10 or more layers (which isn't necessary). 

The colour is extremely pigmented but darker than i was hoping, based on the picture.

Product can stand alone or can be used under or for blending (must blend before sets!!)

Was hoping for a closer to beige look for buildable and combination looks with other shadows, but I'll see what I can do.

name: briaaaana
title: best cream shadow out there!
text: I can’t say how much I love this product. I started with one color and have been buying them all. They are so creamy and blendable but then set and are waterproof. Use with your finger or a synthetic brush. Great for layering underneath other eyeshadow or to use as eyeliner, or even an under eye smudge instead of using eye shadow.

name: aburke5
title: do not sleep on this!
text:
I love this product so much! It’s such a unique, multi-purpose product. The mica in this shade is so beautiful and can create multiple looks. You can use a lighter hand to achieve a shimmery look or you can use more and get a more metallic sheen. 

A tiny bit goes such a long way. I use the tiniest dot and can cover my whole eyelid. 

I love DM beauty. Such a fan.

name: LeadLinda
title: Fantastic Long Stay Lip Color
text: I looked for year to find that perfect color and this is it.  Also, this product does last all day.  The only negative is that you need to find a good lip brush to apply the color.

name: discowitch
title: Astounding!
text: After watching Danessa work with this pigment on a model, I knew I had to buy it. The tiniest amount just goes...and goes...and goes. The blending time is just long enough, and I can use my fingers or brushes, depending on the precision level I want.

name: whailey
title: 10/10 - Amazing Product!!
text: This is my first time trying this product and I absolutely love it. It is transfer-proof and the color is very vibrant. I used it as a lipstick, eyeliner, and an eyeshadow. I have combination skin, and I have to say I’m pleased with the wearability of this product. Upon applying it, it feels like a cream, but once it dries, it becomes weightless and matte. I really loved this product because I could barely tell I was wearing anything on my face. Usually, I have a hard time finding products that are genuinely transfer-proof, smudge-proof, and weightless. I am so happy I stumbled upon this product. I also have to say that it’s pretty easy to take off as well depending on what products you use. I used the Garnier waterproof micellar water and with a few swipes there was very little smudging, and the product came right off.

name: SaraSingh
title: Excellent Pigment - a little goes a long way
text: This stuff is highly pigmented. I bought it to use as a blush and while it works well, it is difficult to get the amount you need and not too much. It has good staying power and blends well, and I love the colour. I’m sure I will be using it a long time.

name: Nanners0
title: Very pigmented
text: This is the most pigmented cream color I’ve ever used. A little dab goes a long long way. Blend fast though since the matte formula dries relatively quickly. Long lasting formula and if you use it right, it’s totally worth the hype.

name: JacklynJetSet
title: Multi purpose white shadow blows my mind
text:
This product, Colorfix, is the ideal dream product of all creative makeup artists.
Build able coverage, incredibly well pigmented,  dries quickly and doesn't budge, becomes waterproof.
Can be extended with the Danessa Myricks Beauty Beauty Oil
I have tons of colors, incredible product.

name: georgiaapeaach
text: I really wanted to love this as an eyeliner. I saw the shade in store, and Chocolate is this beautiful berry toned brown that has a ton of red and purple pigment. I was so excited to try. But this is truly such a mess to use as an eyeliner. I had to squeeze a drop onto a palette, and coat an eyeliner brush. My issue is that it starts to dry quite quickly. So after I applied the initial wing and dipped in to apply more, it started to get patchy because it was drying at different paces. After 5 days of trying to use it as a liner, I gave up. I tried wearing it as an eyeshadow, but this thing is so incredibly opaque that it really doesn't blend out. I just found this formula was too hard to work with an not worth the hassle. Lastly, you NEED to use an oil to remove this stuff. None of my face washes could get it off.

name: TaylorRy
title: sooo good
text: I got primary red to use as an eyeliner. This formula is A++++ it does NOT smudge or transfer and it will not stain the skin. It took so little to achieve full pigment. These are an amazing way to get creative as it’s such a multi use product. I’m pretty sure i’ll own all the colors by the end of the year.

name: lydia222222
title: nice blending
text: nice pigment and blends out well. I have only used it by itself and like it a lot

name: lydia222222
title: no good
text: too watery and doesn't dry down well. doesnt blend obviously, kinda unusable tbh. flakes easily. cool color, too bad it doesnt stay on the lid

name: sspeltz
title: Life changing
text: Every time I buy a new makeup product, I've convinced myself it's going to be the one that changes my life. This time I was right! I'm so glad the advisor recommended it to me. As a heavy duty makeup artist and performer with oily skin, it's very hard for me to get a long lasting, clean cut crease. This lasts all night and doesn't budge. I've tried all kinds of primers and concealers to get eyeshadow to stick and this is head and shoulders above the rest. To me, it beats the following concealers and eyeshadow primers as a base: Lancome Teint Idole concealer, P. Louise, Urban Decay, Too Faced BTW, Tarte Shape Tape, Clinique (all primers and concealers) , Morphe, Estee Lauder Doublewear Concealer, Nars primer, Bobbi Brown (all), Elizabeth Mott, and Revolution (concealer). A must have for any makeup pro. I'm currently using the white for a dramatic look but plan to purchase a flesh tone in the future. I cannot recommend it enough. Worth every penny. A little goes a long way, and it's super easy to use. My new favorite thing.

name: Cytto
title: The duochrome foil of my dreams
text: I put this on my lids over the shade Rustic and it turned out beautiful. You can either blend it on your eyelid to pull out the glitter aspect of it, or apply it straight onto your lid and pat it down to bring out the foiled effect. After applying I recommend holding your eyes closed for 30 seconds or less for it to dry down, but once it dries it doesn't budge or feel heavy.

name: Cytto
title: Versatile product that is worth the $$
text: Amazingly pigmented but can be blended out beautifully. I used this as a shadow and used it with an eyeliner brush to make a bold wing. Went on great as an blush AND lipstick!

name: lowborn
text: Super beautiful nude shimmer, almost gives a wet effect when the light hits it. The formula is super thin and comfortable and lasts all day, even when my lids get oily. I’m using Milky Way here and chocolate as liner.

name: Mpll
title: Review For Shade Venus
text: This shade is a very pretty colour with quite a bit of glitter. It’s translucent so there isn’t that much of a base pigment other than a pretty pink colour. When layered with the Urban Decay eye primer it stays put for about 9 hours. By itself it lasted 5 hours before it creased on me but I do have oily lids that are prone to creasing.

name: lowborn
title: truly underrated
text: I had originally bought the primary red because I’m always on the hunt for great red eye products and after trying it, I was hooked and had to get the black and the white is on my wishlist. They’re a really thin, easy to work with consistency but EXTREMELY pigmented and dry down comfortably matte. The black has got to be the best eyeliner I’ve ever used, my only complaint is that I don’t like squeeze packaging but I understand that it’s a personal preference.

name: legallyblondie
title: Patchy mess
text: I’ve seen so many rave reviews but this was a total fail for me. I am on the hunt to replace my beloved MAC paint pot in Quite Natural and this is not it. On my fair skin, this shows up as pure purple. No brown in sight. I applied two layers and it was very patchy and didn’t blend well, so I tapped on a matte brown shadow. It looked great at first. By the end of the work day, it was a purple patchy nightmare. This product did not apply well, blend well, or wear well. Thank you Sephora for your excellent return policy! I wish this had worked and I’m still curious about the shimmer shades, but I cannot recommend this shade/formula

name: coribelle
title: Perfect Pinky Nude
text: Perfect pigmentation for lips and cheeks. I am in love with his product and have bought additional Colorfix colors, happily.  Danessa Myricks is the Queen!

name: darleneg
title: Lovely colors at a great price!
text: I'm 57 years old, retired, active, and still love wearing  and trying out new products. I ordered the Rose Dream Trio to begin with and loved, loved, ballerina. The other two don't work well for my eyes so I use them on my lips. I then ordered Milky Way and it was waaaaay too sparkly for me. I also ordered Romance and love the color, but the formula is so runny, I've made several messes, including a big splotch on my shoes. I still use it, but have to remember to be verrrry careful. All in all, these are beautiful, long lasting products at a great price and my go to along with Thrive Causemetics eye shimmer pencils.

name: twocatmom
title: Lovely Gel Face Color
text: Lovely, long wearing, gel formula. This hot pink matte shade is very saturated, so use sparingly on fairer skin tones.

name: GeorgiePeach
title: amazing
text: This is so pigmented so a little goes a long way. The color is so pretty. It does dry a bit quick. Definitely buying more colors

name: pvnia
text: kinda leaves a patchy trace. not that easy to use.

name: SatoriLuna
title: this is such a versatile product!
text:
As a makeup artist this is amazing! I can create a Smokey eye so easily. Just squeeze a little out onto my palette and grab a dense brush and place on lid. I then grab a blending brush and blend up to crease. I add a little brown on the crease and then I let pigment set and it doesn’t leave fall out. I then go do either my brows or start color correcting and if I want it to be really longwear I tap a little black
Shadow on the lid. Then blend and you have a super pigmented quick smokey eye. I haven’t tried it on my lips yet but that’s my next thing to try. I have used it as liner and it dries down matte. A great product for every goth, glam, and makeup artist.

name: HollydayS2
text: Highly pigmented, glides smooth and easy on skin, super durable! Just amazing!

name: jumpcutjen
text: Love it. Use Crème Brûlée all the time. Mostly on eyelids, sometimes lips too… goes on smooth.

name: Shojax
title: Small product goes a long way
text: One dot on each cheek is all you need for instant color- even on brown skin! Surprisingly lasts all day, this small tube will last a long time! Stays put on eyelids as well. Will try on lips soon. Worth it!

name: jenniered
text:
Love this 3 in 1 
I mostly use it on my lips , lasts almost all day. Adds alittle shine . Cannot wait to get a few other shades .

name: PatriciaLo
title: Wow wow WOW
text: okay so i'm going through this phase where i like for the colors on my lips to simply complement what i already have going on. and this shade is amazing. totally brown girl friendly. i am a medium-deep complexion and this color is everything on the lips. i know it can be worn numerous ways. but if you are a brown girl please give the shade cupcake a try as a lip color. you will not regret it!

name: greneyes
title: Yuck
text: Color disaster.  Very dark brown Pink! Why pink or dark pink.  Not the color shown on line.  If color was right I would like product. Seems to have staying power, but my gosh horrible color unless this was a mistake & labeled wrong. Sending back.  My forst order with them.

name: Dai2
title: Yessss!!!
text: Colofix in Carrot Top gives what it’s supposed to GIVE!  Great waterproof pigment that melts on your skin and blends with ease.  A little goes a long way.  I’m wearing it on my eyes, cheeks and lips.

name: mintjulep7
title: gimmie all the real reds!
text: I have been looking for a real red I could put on my eyes and this is it. A little goes a long way and it is you can build up ~ stays put ~ goes on creamy and dries within a reasonable amount of time. I paired it with a matte red ~ go easy putting on a waterline ~ it spidered into my eyeball at first but that is my learning curve. I had too much on my brush.

name: JKSEA
title: Disappointed
text: I had such high hopes for this product I bought it and didn’t use it immediately I opened it about a month later and it was so sticky and such a strange consistency I couldn’t wear it on my eyes, my eyelids skin stuck to itself even after letting it dry for over 10 minutes…. I reached out to someone who uses these products all the time she confirmed this was not a normal texture of the product and was surprised at the way it was reacting when it was applied. I reached out to the company just basically saying hey .. can this be replaced I clearly have a bad tube and they said no you’re not using it right it’s not the product it is user error…i have since tried a few other colors from this line and they were fine .. It is just too bad the company wanted nothing to do with hearing about this bad tube of product…very disappointing. though the other products that I did try they were also colorfix… I really liked then, the product worked as expected. I just can’t give this a good review, when that was first experience with this brand and their customer service.  I didn’t want anything for free just a replacement as I had tossed the packaging upon opening and it had been over a month since purchasing I went to DM directly and not Sephora, maybe that was a misstep but still disappointed.

name: ThebeautyLover1
title: BUY CARROT TOP IF YOU HAVE BROWN TAN SKIN
text: Loveeee the orange on my medium-medium deep skin tone!!

name: Corsick
text: I put this on my eyes & it was super dark & blotchy. I didn't like the color, either. I returned it.

name: TinaNYCC
title: lipgloss on eye by its self
text:
Pros: its lasting, its a beautiful color, and pigmented
Cons: this is not to be meant to be used alone, if you put it on your eyelids its almost like lipgloss. Its so sticky doesnt dry down by its self. Also its patchy used alone.

I recommend you using a base color and then apply this to your eyes, like an eyeshadow topper and somehow like this it does dry down.

I provided photos. 1) with base on my eye 2) on my hand without a base

name: onlylinz
title: Have a gameplan and it's great!
text: A little goes a long way with these to get the color payoff. Formula does dry within a minute or two, so as long as you know what look you're going for and how to work fast, pretty set. Would also recommend using a palette or surface when handling more than a drop just so you don't get it everywhere or have it dried down where you don't need it.

name: kitchensink
title: An amazing product
text: This duochrome liquid shadow is to die for. It's layerable and delivers amazing colour.

name: oXMakeupKateXo
title: Everyone needs this colour!
text: I love colorfix, they are a staple in my kit but this colour is my all time favorite, it looks great on everyone. Such a quick, long lasting product. It won't take be long before I need a new one!

name: KymberLayne
title: Gorgeous twinkle
text: This is everything I hoped it would be and more! I got this shade specifically after seeing my favorite youtuber rave about it. It's the most sparkly, gorgeous cream shadow, that lasts all day without creasing. I think it's perfect for the holiday season.

name: Msgdfx1
title: Fantastic, intense color.
text: Fantastic. Very intense color. A little goes a long way. So happy I discovered this product.

name: Trapcat
text: I never thought I would be putting gloss on my eyes but now I can't stop. Dotting this color on gives me the perfect pinky brick eye color and the gloss looks amazing. Surprisingly it doesn slide around or crease on my lid lines. It is easy to blend out with my fingertip or mini beauty blender. I have 3 colors ready but these are so versatile I will be buying more.

name: Apursel15
text: I love everything about the Danessa myricks all the color fixes are so amazing! I just wish they had more in store so we could try out in person!

name: AGNTALPX
text: Color is good but very easy to fade. Sticky but ok for me. I tried it on lips and eyebrows. Lips color was disappearing in several hours. Eyebrows were fine. Didn’t try eyes and checks but did not believe it would stay there longer. Be careful if wearing in moisture surrounding. Should be ok if does not touch any moisture staff.

name: MNikkila
title: Be Careful
text: I purchased 3 shades: Ballerina, Milky Way and Kaleidoscope. First pay attention to the finish of the color you’re buying and what your intended use is. I usually stay away from multipurpose makeup like this because I find when products try to do it all, they’re not excellent at any of them. However, I do love 2 out of the 3 shades I bought. I’m not sure how anyone could wear the glaze finishes on their eyes… it would literally be like putting lip gloss on your lids… no thanks. So I will be returning kaleidoscope. The other two colors are wonderful and I love the look. I will consider getting more colors but will for sure be staying away from the glaze finish.

name: arlips
text: Color too intense. Looked like my eyes were bleeding

name: Tanmitchy
text: This product is beyond awful. I initially bought it to use as an eyeshadow topper but figured I’d try it on its own. It made my eyelids a sticky, glittery mess and the product itself was impossible to blend. I will 100% be returning it.

name: thebinwv
title: nothing special
text: You have better options at the drugstore. This did not blend well and it was nothing special.

name: Denetnet1
title: Great pigment
text: Highly pigmented and buildable. I know this sounds repetitive but a little goes a long way. Be quick with the brush tho, it dries fast once applied. The color is really beautiful ! Easy to blend as long as you work fast! Unlike Kaleidoscope I’m satisfied with this one.

name: suryea
title: super versatile
text: This product is so versatile. The shade I picked up (Ballerina) has a beautiful shine and metallic finish. The product is smooth and evenly pigmented throughout. A small amount goes a long way. It also does not crease or accentuate fine lines. I use this product as a highlighter, an inner eye corner highlight, a shade all over the lid, and mixed into several different lip products. I swatched some of the matte shades in store and will definitely be picking some up.

name: SKEEZIX66
title: Meh
text: Very pigmented which I wasn’t expecting. Trying to go light handed was challenging as it dries off very quickly. Colour is pretty so I will continue to try to use it - maybe mixed with some moisturizer (I haven’t tried it on my lips, only on my cheeks).

name: WH92
title: not enough buildup
text: i imagine that the people who give this product high reviews are using a different formula, or perhaps expecting a sheer result. while the colour is quite beautiful, it really cannot be built up. i waited for the first layer to dry on my lids, then began applying another layer, only to find that the base layer lifted right up!! i tried dabbing, pressing, blotting, smoothing - all very, very gently. it appears one simply cannot build up this product in this formulation/colour. i've given it two stars because despite this, i imagine i will still be able to use it for an art project or a very temporary photo.

name: dancelover
title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful color and it stays on all day and it does not flake on your face..

name: productrater
title: Pretty shiny bronze eyeshadow
text: This was the first DM colorfix that I ever used and it's still my favourite and stands out from all the rest. The colour payoff is strong but this blends out easily and diffuses into a pretty colour, looks like you have several colours on your eyes.. The formula is nice, sets quite fast. I apply it with my fingers and only use a tiny dot and build it up on the lids. I bought Chocolate and did not like it, it was hard to work with.

name: hazeleyebeauty
text: Love this eyeshadow- bought 2 colors now- a little goes a long way and they stay put.

name: Denetnet1
title: looks gorgeous but it smudged my liner
text:
I’m giving this product 4 stars because it smudged my liner after a while. So it kinda moves around after you put it on. I would recommend not to use eyeliner if you’re going to use this. And if you’re going to use it on the face as highlighter wear your hair up because otherwise the hair sticks in the product ! 
Other than that great pigment. I just think I need to play around with it more and find the best ways to get the most outta it !

name: michb
title: truly long wearing formula
text: I’m obsessed with these. They don’t budge, but I think the swatches suck and they are often darker on than in pics. I use exposed in my crease for a day look. Hope they carry a wider assortment of this product line. I’ve bought several shades already and will probably buy more. A little goes a long way, so the price could be worse.

name: desertgirl74
title: Great Staying Power - Doesn't Budge!
text: I bought Desert Rose, Chocolate, Clear and Black Out for Halloween (I went as a pirate). A little goes a long long way with this product. I'm glad I practiced with it before applying it for wearing it out. I like Desert Rose for lipstick, it stays on through drinking, eating and other lip activities. LOL. I wish Chocolate was more brown. It has a lot of red undertone to it. It makes for a good deep berry lipstick. After awhile my lips did dry out and I need a lip balm for moisture. The blackout stayed on my lids and as liner until midnight...then it started to crease but I have very oily eyelids. I'll use my Urban Decay eyeshadow primer next time. I'm taking a star off because I wasn't really able to use it as a blush. I mixed with my moisturizer to give it some slip and my cheeks ended up looking splotchy. I think these tubes will last a very long time.

name: valentinavm
text: I got 3 colors in these, 2 matte and one glitter shade. They’re all incredible. The shade exposed is a great quick everyday all over the eye color for me. Or I have also used it as a base for other looks. It’s long lasting and doesn’t crease. The only thing is that you have to be ready to blend pretty fast, so do one eye at a time. I prefer using a brush to blend it too, I use my finger to apply and then blend it out with a brush.

name: AubreyJean16
title: GET THIS NOW
text: This is the best liquid eyeshadow on the market!! If you are thinking tambourine purchasing this eyeshadow… do it!!

name: gugz28
text: Amazing lasting colour. Sometimes it’s a little hard to spread but otherwise it’s amazing colour that lasts forever. I’m excited to try it on my beach vacation as it is waterproof.

name: scottherron
title: Lasts through anything
text: Got the matte black. Does not budge. I wore it all over my eyes to a heavy metal show. Sweated buckets and even cried during one of the emotional songs. This eye paint stayed in the exact place that I put it. I am very impressed. You definitely don’t forget that it’s there, as it makes your skin feel a bit odd when it’s all over, but I don’t care.

name: berriturtle
title: Beautiful but fades….
text: Celebration is a pretty light bronze color with shimmer. I use a tiny dot and pat on mostly the outer corners of my eyes then I pat the remaining on the rest of my eye so I get a nice gradient effect. I then put some on an eyeliner brush and line my top and lower lash line. My eye make up looks amazing. The reason I’m giving 3/5 stars is because my eye makeup fades after a few hours. If it lasted longer I would give 5/5. I have oily lids but I do not have this issue with other cream products that state they last all day.

name: pamelataveras4
title: poor shade description for Exposed
text:
Color description for the shade exposed is so off it’s literally pink, no hint of brown/nude/beige as described or pictured at all. Almost wondering if it was a lab miss-print cus ain’t no way.   
Otherwise lasts all day long blends nicely would have given 5 stars if color was as pictured :/

name: viktoria73
text: This is the best cream eyeshadow I’ve ever used for $18. I love the CT one but is very expensive so this is perfect and there’s a ton of colors and textures. Recommend 100%

name: mjbalm
text: This was so difficult to use. Hard to blend and super dark.  It didn’t last.  Would buy product

name: coachdanielle
title: Eye Glitter Heaven
text: If your looking for the perfect glitter pop THIS IS YOUR SIGN!!! It is thick which allows you to keep it in one place instead of shedding all over your face. Think of a dewy liquid full on eyeshadow but glitter version!

name: Geestarr
title: Pretty great!
text:
I have several of these in matte and foils. The mattes are better than the foils. Be warned - these do NOT move after they're set and they dry FAST, so have a plan. You get about 30 seconds before it's a done deal. They blend nicely with a brush - but hurry! 

The foils are really pretty but inconsistent. Some of the shades are kind of chunky, others are beautiful. Milky Way is one of my favorites.

As lip colors these all work very well. Lightweight and long lasting.

As cheek colors they are also beautiful, but use caution! These are VERY pigmented and you only need about the size of a pinhead to get the job done. Tap it into a brush really good and then use a light hand. This also will not move after it's on.

That said I do love the versatility of these as well as the wear time.

name: tara12
title: extremely sticky
text: This was probably the worst cream shadow I’ve tried. It was comically bad. When it dried down it became extremely sticky to the point my eyelids were sticking together in my creases. I removed it because obviously couldn’t leave my eyes like that. Also this shade weirdly only left glitter, no actual pigment on my eyes.

name: Jmeeehehe
title: Great multi-use products that last on oily skin
text: I picked up two of these (exposed and kaleidoscope) and I absolutely love them. The matte shade is a little cooler toned in person than pictured on the website, but it makes for an excellent contour shade on my light-medium skin. As an eye product, it lasts quite a long time on my oily lids. It's a little drying on the lips, but lasts through meals, if you're into that sort of thing. The balm shade is fantastic: it's slightly warm toned, and the glitter is super subtle on the face. It's one of the prettiest most natural looking highlights I have tried. One thing I've noticed in other reviews is people complaining that these dry down super fast, which has not been my experience at all. I'm not sure if they vary by shade, but I've had no issue with dropping some on the side of my hand and blending it onto my lid, into my crease, or into my cheekbone before drying. If you're curious about these, grab one, because I really don't think you'll be disappointed.

name: AmyLynn7178
text: This is really pretty! I use as a highlighter, and it doesn’t loft my foundation or give extra texture. Gives a really nice wet look!

name: 4StarJen
title: Glitter for those who hate glitter
text: I saw one live swatch video of this product and knew I needed to have it. It has been out of stock forever. It finally came back in stock at the start of the sale and ohhhhhhh my goodness is this beautiful. It's super glittery, but washes away so easily. No finding glitter on your face for days. It's gorgeous.

name: HBGgirl
title: not really nude
text: I was excited to try this from the pictures and color expectation. Beware, this is NOT a nude. It dried down very quickly (which I liked) as a pinky/purple color. The color is pretty but not what is advertised and not what I thought I was buying nor is it some thing that I would wear. I will however try a different color because I do like the matte dry down and what the final look, looks like.  I suggest trying them in store if you’re able to before you purchase.

name: MissKitty4563
title: Exposed is not neutral, VERY red purple undertone
text: Firstly, the product works! Stays on all day, is easy to blend, and is very pigmented. I can only speak for the matte shades. However the shade 'Exposed' which is what I purchased thinking it would be a nice transition shade, a neutral nude beige is not beige whatsoever.  It's a lot darker than pictured, and has a VERY red/purple undertone, and on me looks like I have an eye infection lol . If you have light/pale skin or even light/medium, this will look pinky purple on you.  It may look a lot more neutral however on a medium, medium/dark skin tone. I'm hoping a lighter neutral shade will be available at some point, and the description of Exposed will be updated, because the formulation is lovely!

name: qrkymerlot
title: Beautiful color
text: Fantastic color. Taupe-y brown with a slight shimmer. Perfect middle ground between brown and gray. My favorite color yet!!!!!

name: poepoe
title: Halfway disappointed
text:
I was more excited for these to arrive with my order more than a kid on Christmas but I can only half recommend them. I have Wild Orchid (shimmer) and Valentine (matte). I'm 52 with slightly hooded eyes, oily lower lids, drier upper lids, and the usual wrinkles and textural difficulties of someone my age. I also don't see well without glasses so I had planned on using these as a sweep of color just on my lower lids instead of anything precise since I can't see well enough for detail application. 

It dries really, really fast, you have to work very quickly so it will take a good amount of practice.  A tiny bit goes a long way so just squeeze a tiny dot. The matte shade applied evenly and I was able to build up the color in the socket and let the rest stay a little more sheer. Both the denser and lighter application turned out really nice. As a blush it dried way too fast to blend. On the lips it seemed it would be a good lip stain but it didn't last through lunch like other lip stains often do. 

Wild Orchid was very patchy. Building up definitely did not work because of the shimmer texture. The shimmer ended up falling under my eye and on the very tops of my cheekbones. It basically ended up looking like textured, patchy mud on the lids with flecks of glitter in places I didn't want glitter. 

These aren't sold in stored but a few weeks ago the store near me had 5 shades for a limited time and I tried Ballerina (shimmer) on the back of my hand and the texture was wonderful on my hand so I don't know why Wild Orchid is so bad even though it's the same texture and finish. The sales associate told me to get the clear one as well because according to him,  it "locks" in the color but I highly doubt that's what it's used for. 

So, I was halfway disappointed with my purchase. I may see if Wild Orchid would work as an eyeliner but don't have any hopes. 

The matte lasted much longer while the shimmer transferred to my upper lid.

name: mkenzie72
text: Wow! I really like it as a blush and as a lip colour. Haven’t really tried it out on my eyes as an eyeshadow yet though.

name: swyhte
title: Great product for a variety of looks!
text: So pigmented; a little goes a very long way. In the pic I used it all over for a everyday look, but I’ve just applied like cream blush over a full beat(powdered face, contour) as well.  I want more colors! Remember a little goes a very long way. It can be sticky as a matte lip color.

name: TiffTiffMarie
title: I’ve Neglected Everything Else!
text: I have so many shades! They’re so easy to use and blend smoothly with one another. A drop goes such a long way. I always have to make sure I’m not squeezing out more than I need. You can mix them together and create any shade you want. I barely touch my palettes anymore. Danessa Myricks is a wizard!

name: kaylaharnae
title: Fresh, dewy, and light!
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. Very fresh and dewy. The perfect product for your everyday makeup look. You can wear it to the gym or to work, your choice. Love the freshness it gives and it always makes me feel that more awake and ready for the day.

name: jessicalocklear
title: multi-use product, great value + pigment!
text: a really versatile, beautiful pigment. I used it on my eyes, cheeks, and lips. it can be a subtle wash of color, or it can be a really stand out pigment. I found some irritation on my eyes, but it would’ve been another new product I used. a tiny bit goes a really long way, so I’d experiment with different techniques (brush, sponge, fingers, etc) before applying to the face. this color was a good neutral reddish, I liked it the most on my cheeks.

name: PADMA22
title: Great pigment
text: I've been on the hunt for years to replicate that rosy "just went for a run" look that my cheeks get when I workout and the blushes I thought were close were either too red or pinky and artificial looking, so I saw Latte and I was worried it would be too dark on my light medium skin but its not! It blends *s e a m l e s s l e y* into a healthy flush that looks exactly it's my own skin and not makeup. The texture is unlike any cream or liquid blush I've tried, it evenly disperses the pigment as you blend it in with your fingers or a foundation brush and you don't have to worry about over doing it

name: tatiigardner
title: Great Pigment!
text: Such a gorgeous color!! I was worried that it wouldn’t show or it would oxidize weird on my skin tone but it looks perfect. It’s super pigmented and has such a beautiful finish.

name: MichelleDaBelle
title: stunning but…
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review, all opinions my own!!

an absolutely gorgeous shade that goes from a pink to strong gold reflect.  easy to apply, super high shine and sparkle, strong flip, amazing staying power, and no fallout!  my only caveat is that it has a fairly sheer base, which makes it ideal for use as a topper.  if you continue to apply it as it’s drying, it can lift and become a little patchy (see second photo).  however, i’ve found if i work quickly and don’t go back to fix while it’s drying, i have no issues. 

overall really beautiful shade that i love to amp up eye looks with

name: emilyfern0730
title: great product!
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review

I overall loved this product! I love how smooth it goes on and the color is GORGEOUS. I did a messy euphoria type of look and liked it! A little goes a long way, I used too much and it did not look good at first. I used a thin angle brush to do an eyeliner look with it and it was easy.

name: BrittW23
title: Fabulous Lip Cream Pigment!
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review!  I chose Danessa Myricks Beauty Colorfix Eye, Cheek and Lip Cream Pigment.  This product is multifaceted, multipurpose and overall a great buy!  The application is smooth and not chalky dries quickly and is lightweight! I wore it as a lipstain and an eyeshadow!! It also goes well with my complexion. I would and plan on buying different colors to have more to choose from! This is Brittany Approved! 

Thank you Sephora!

name: Lana26
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. I choose primary red. If you love long wearing vibrant matte colors, you’ll like this brand and color. Its a deep red that I think it’ll look great on anyone, it reminds me of ruby woo from MAC but the only DIFFERENCE is that it wears for a VERY long time and it doesn’t transfer under your mask.

name: slaywithnay
title: So much pigment!!
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review, and I had to get my hands on this Danessa Myricks Beauty pigment! Cupcake is a BEAUTIFUL mauve color that compliments my deep skin tone so well. I used it as a lip color and a bit on my cheeks as well. The pigment is opaque and doesn’t separate even after long wear. I’ll definitely be trying more shades!!

name: amandaglam
title: A beauty game-changer!!
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. This is such a great product to have in your collection. Truly a game-changer. I've used this as a blush, lip color, and eyeshadow, it makes such a gorgeous monochromatic look. A little bit goes a very long way with this product, all I needed was a single dot for a very pigmented look. I also noticed this product is long-lasting and lasts all day. I'd recommend this and I'll be buying more shades soon.

name: s0ftbabyangel
title: beautiful eye gloss!!
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. This is prefect for creating editorial-style glossy eyelids! The small nozzle makes it easy to apply where you want it, and its very easy to work with. I like to apply it using a flat eyeshadow brush, but fingers also work well. The little flecks of micro glitter don't feel too gritty, and it leaves a gorgeous high-shine finish. 

That being said, be sparing with your use! Applying too much could lead to it seeping into your eyes - admittedly this gloss has a lot less body than I expected it have. Remove this using an oil based cleanser, such as a cleansing oil, cleansing balm, or miscellar water - anything else will be a struggle.

name: chinezeslife
title: a multi-use GEM!
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review

it’s the bold pigment for me!  a little goes a LONG way with this product, so don't be intimidated by the size.  i love that this formula is buildable, and blends out like a dream. i use it primarily as a blush (pictured), however it’s great as an eyeshadow too.  this shade compliments my brown skin so well, i can't wait to get more colors!

name: oakoreo
title: Wowow
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. 
I was immediately drawn to this 3-in-1 product because I thought it’d be perfect for travel. I’m really into orange red tones for both my lips and eyes so I gravitated towards “rustic” and it’s such a beautiful color! I was amazed at how pigmented it is and how easy it is to apply. For a dark shade I was afraid it wouldn’t be blend easily but it does!! It’s so lightweight that it doesn’t feel like I’m wearing lipstick. Even on dry lips bc of the cold season, it went on nice and smooth!

name: Dewilka
title: Perfect all-in-one routine
text: Your ideal all-in-one face product! I love how multi-purpose and how travel friendly it is. Easy and perfect for on-the-go mornings or light pack trips. The color is gorgeous! and the color pay off is more than you'd expect. Gorgeous plum color, great for fall. Super easy to apply, non-sticky, non-tacky texture. Doesnt look too glossy, perfect texture. Perfect addition to a simple makeup routine.

name: chizoba
title: Glaze (clear)
text:
“I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review“ 

I am new to the world of lip glosses and decided to pick the glaze clear color, and let me say I was skeptical at first but I can never leave my house without it! It goes perfectly with any look and any lip liner! Throw on your fav lip liner and this gloss and you have a nice nudish look!

name: NiaImanii
title: Danessa Myricks is that Gworl!!!
text: I absolutely love this product!! I received a gift card to select any product of my choice, and I chose the foil in the shade mermaid. A little goes a long way and it dries pretty quickly. I find the best way to apply this product would be with a synthetic flat brush. Using a natural hair brush will only soak up product, and the application won’t be as seamless. I love this shade on my complexion, and I can definitely see myself purchasing more shades in the future!!

name: tinycupofcake
text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. 

Danessa Myricks Beauty is a new brand to me and I am very pleasantly surprised with this product. I don't experiment much with eye color but I do like to wear a matte black liner each day. I find the liquid eyeliner pens to dry out often so I will use eyeshadow as an alternative - unfortunately that smudges easily. This product in Blackout is a true black, dries matte, and does not budget even without a primer!

name: HollieNewlin
title: Excellent multipurpose pigment!!
text:
* I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review *
I am so very pleased with this Waterproof Matte Liquid Pigment for eyes, lips and checks from Danessa Myricks Colorfix™️!! I'll be honest, I'm usually not a fan of multipurpose products like this. They typically work great for one thing but not so much the others. But this cream pigment actually does work as a multiuse  pigment! It's excellent for use on the eyes, the lips AND the cheeks - all 3 equally as good! I love the texture of this cream pigment! It's super lightweight and silky. It's absolutely effortless to apply and blend with either a brush or finger. And it's not greasy or sticky at all like a lot of liquid/cream pigments tend to be. The shade Latte is a gorgeous matte and would look amazing on any skin tone! It's not too 'pinky' looking either. It's more of a deeper, dusty rose color that just looks so pretty. It's also highly pigmented and just a little bit goes such a long way. The formula dries down quickly, is completely crease-proof, waterproof, smudge-proof and has some serious staying power. It literally lasts me all day without needing to ever reapply. Plus this pigment is easy to layer with other shades or use alone for a dramatic pop of color. I can most definitely see why this cream pigment is an Allure Best of Beauty Winner! I'm so excited to try out some of the other colors and finishes! Highly recommended!!

name: Lyzmarie
text:
*I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review*

I love to get creative with my makeup sometimes and so I decided to try Danessa Myricks Colorifix, finally. First of all, you only need a little bit to get what you want. If you think you only squeezed out a little bit, it's still too much, LOL. 

I absolutely love the color I chose and it gives enough play time before it dries completely. I find that you can layer shadows on top but I prefer to use this for more simple, statement looks.  Also, I suggest using an oil based makeup remover. xD

name: lizzyruiz
text: received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review, and I chose this amazing product. First of all, ...WOW! This product is truly amazing. It's very pigmented and long lasting. It does dry pretty quick so you have to move fast. If you want a subtle color, start with less and gradually add more for a more darker look. A little does go a long way. I loved it!

name: glowwithjess
title: THE PIGMENT WOW
text: this is a beautiful, smooth and easy to work with pigment. I absolutely love it!

name: Shikhs
title: Love it!!
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review and I chose the shade "Alien - rosy gold foil". I was looking for some pigment that gives a glam look and at the same time which is easy to apply and this is exactly what I wanted. Something that can give a dazzling look in just a minute. Moreover, there was no fallout and the shimmer lasted so long. I used this for my eyes and I love the pinkish golden color so much. I am sure I will buy more variants of it to use on my cheek and lips as well. I love this 3-in-1 pigment.

name: mlfreder
text: Very nice shade! It isn’t overly chunky or glittery but I found it dried down pretty quickly on my finger so I had to moved fast. I will use a brush from now on to see if that helps. Love the convenience of this being in a tube & a little goes a long way. Works well with the powder shadows I use as well.

name: bpfort
title: Built to last!
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review, and I chose this amazing product! The founder knew what they were doing with this product. At first I was nervous but once I put this on, I became a HUGE fan. I tried it on my lips first to see how long it would last, and it lasted a full day without any smudging–it lasted through coffee breaks, lunch, tabling on campus, and taking my mask on and off! If you ever need one product that catches everything (especially for a long day) I would totally choose this! The other great thing about this product is if you’re wanting to try a new color for your lips (or eyes or cheek) but are unsure you can always keep the product and use it for another part of your makeup routine. This was a BIG plus for me since I hate returning stuff and now I can try a product that I can use for different purposes…a win-win!

name: astfashionista
title: Perfect for any everyday makeup routine!
text: [I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review.] I’m not a big makeup girl. Give me a good foundation, concealer and nude eyeshadow and I’m good to go! I was looking for a product that was easy to use and easily goes with my everyday makeup routine and I love this Colorfix Eye, Cheek & Lip Cream Pigment! It makes for a beautiful eyeshadow and I love putting it on my lips and cheeks when I want to add a little color to them. This product is so pigmented too!

name: aimscray
title: Disappointing
text: I’m so disappointed in this. I was so excited to try it because my eyelids have become puffy and creepy and powder just accentuates this. I really thought this was the answer but the color is so so wrong, among a couple of other things, unfortunately. I should have known when I tried the brown matte color. To be fair, the description says “berry brown”, but it’s more like berry with a hint of brown. The “nude beige matte” as the Exposed color is described is very similar. It’s more of a very pink mauve. Beige it is not. I looked like I was either in the midst of an eye infection or had just gotten a slug in the face. I’m sure the color looks nice on some skin tones but I really wish this was the color described. In addition, it stayed quite sticky on my lids. I thought I might have better luck using it as blush but it settled in my pores something fierce! On to the lips: a total mess! One thing I will say: this seems like it would be water and transfer-proof on the eye lids. That said, it broke up and cracked on the lips. I really really hope the formula and color get an update because I love the concept.

name: fabcocktail
title: Subtle and long lasting
text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. I’m one who doesn’t love a ton of makeup so I was pleasantly surprised just how subtle it was. The color was long-lasting on my lips (I forgot to take it off at night lol and it’s still on me a little bit the morning!) and I also used it as an eye shadow when I went out for dinner and drinks. This is the perfect color for any skin tone. And it’s a GREAT beginner shade for anyone looking to step up their makeup game. Very, very impressed. Also a great price for basically a lippie, eye shadow and blush all in one. Next time, I will most likely put on another coat to make it darker.

name: BreezBeauty
text: I love this multitasking formula! It’s perfect for days when you want a beautiful quick application , one product for is a go for me ! It’s long lasting and the shades are so pretty !

name: Samcro
title: dummy proof multi tasking make up
text: Easy makeup for those out there who like to use our fingers and maybe one brush to apply all our products and yet don’t have any expert make up skills by far, I have a ton of make up and skin care products I can’t resist I admit I am a product junkie even my daughter who does have excellent skills teases me and says are you putting together a make up and skin care museum? don’t get me started on what my husband says when my Sephora delivers show up daily! Lol! but here’s the thing there is a method to my madness and I still do very extensive research before purchasing any make up or skin care product and this versatile easy to use little gem just blows me away!!! I have about 15 colours already but I will comment on a few specifically. Ok first a little tiny tiny bit goes a long way, u can either use a make up palette or the back of ur hand put a small dot of the product and then start the magic, dip in with ur finger or brush it’s a very creamy texture and it can be blended and layered well for colour impact from a light wash to exactly the Colour in the tube, it has incredible play time so if your like me and need more then 5 seconds to blend and layer ur make up this product gives u that extra few seconds. Now I have dry skin and mature skin so the creamy texture is perfect for me catch the key word creamy not greasy however once it dries this product is locked down I also use my favourite eye primer, I have several I like, which also helps hold the colour true prevents fading or creasing, that being said when I finally got a hold of rustic I was so excited to try it I forgot a primer and boy can I say I was very impressed with the colour it really popped against my blue eyes and didn’t fade or crease I am an RN who works 12 hour shifts and there is nothing worse then make up sliding off my eyes and down my cheeks yuck and oh the colours and finishes available to play with in this line well worth giving it a try

name: DollfaceDredie
title: Best Black Liner on the market!
text: Lowkey the best liquid black liner on the market. Such a versatile product too that works as paint or liner. Super pigmented and dries matte and waterproof! Absolutely incredible. Must have for any pro kit; super sanitary packaging too. I’ve had mine for about a year and it hasn’t dried up. Personal fav!

name: tott
title: The Ultimate Multitasking Product
text: The colorfixes are one of my favorite products to use in my collection. They are super versatile & can be used in multiple steps of my makeup routine. I love mixing them to create custom colors as well!  I use at least one every time that I do my makeup.

name: BrazilRaine
title: Team No-Fallout! You've gotta try this!
text:
10/10 LOVE and recommend this product! Think liquid glitter, no fallout EVER! It's absolutely stunning, can be used sheer or built up heavily. I am posting two photos, one of Mermaid (teal w/duochrome finish) and another of Milky Way (silvery/white) so you can see just how versatile the products are. For the photo with the lighter shade I used Milky Way as a highlighter for face and body as well as the eyeshadow. 

Incredible high shine finish, beautiful, easy to blend and build texture, plus all day wear! What more could I ask for in a glitter product. A must-have!

name: ciaraFYB
title: Colorfix is the new way to eyeshadow!
text: Colorfix are by far one of my most used products! One drop can create an entire look, it’s pigmented, light and will last ALL DAY.  Absolutely amazing for editorial and everyday wear. 10/10 forsure!

name: NataliaNG
title: My survival product ❤️
text: I am make up artist and For me Colorfix it is my survival product - even sometime if I can’t take a lot products to my job - always I have at list 5 shades of Colorfix. Colorfix unique product which is   possible to use for lips, eyes, face. Also what is important it is easy to blend , easy to mix with another products, long lasting, waterproof.  I love to mix Colorfix with oils, lip balms. Nude Colorfix possible to mix with foundation to have more coverage….. omg I can talk hours about Colorfix. I can’t tell which shade I like - I love all shades from my collection. I use Colorfix not only for job. I use it for my self, and this is my must have product when I pack for holidays: small packages, multiple possiblity to use .

name: liviavarga
title: Love, love!!
text: I absolutely love Danessa Myricks colorfix pigments, i thing i have all of the colours. Very easy to blend and stays on all day.

name: Afshie87
title: I love the versatility and color!
text: A stunning color to use on the eyes, lips or cheeks. Blends like a dream and doesn’t budge!

name: Afshie87
text: If you want to lift your eyeshadow look add a bit of ColorFix foils on top for an intense shimmer. I love using Venus for that hot pink foiled look with flecks of gold and green shift.

name: Afshie87
title: Looooove!
text: Oh I love this ColorFix shade so much! Beautiful blue shift that blends like a dream and doesn’t budge all day! Super versatile, you can wear as an eyeliner, use as a topper or swipe across the lid or lips.

name: Afshie87
title: You need this in your makeup stash!
text: I use ColorFix practically every time I do my makeup and Crème Brûlée is one of my favorite shades. It’s a beautiful mauvey pink that will suit all skin tones. I love traveling with this as it’s a one and done for eyes, lips, and cheeks! You can’t go wrong with this product! Best part is that it doesn’t budge at all throughout the day!

name: genart
text: I love all of the colorfixes that I’ve been able to get my hands on so far. This metallic blue one “mermaid” is my fave! It beautifully reflects the light and I’ve been able to create so many looks with it. The thing I love the most about colorfix is that it has a multipurpose function so you can use it on the lids, cheek, and lips.

name: odilis
text: One of my favorite Colorfix color to use on brides, on commercials works as a nude color, I mix it with Rustic Colorfix when I need it on the peach range. It is waterproof.  A must have!

name: sourpatchsunshi
text: Love love love, i fell in love with danessa because of this product

name: Marcela1204
title: Beautiful Waterproof Colorfix!
text: This Colorfix is my absolute favorite!! I’ve used it for the cheek , lips and eyes and the coverage is beautiful! I’m a makeup artist and the brides love this creme brulee color and it’s waterproof ! Definitely a must have!!

title: Purple metallic goodness
text: Stunning high shine multiuse product!! I especially love using this shade as an eyeliner as well as mixing it with Lift or Beaches to get a pale lilac colour. This shade is great to add on top of the mattes too to create an awesome metallic finish

title: Fave yellow eyeshadow ever!!
text: The Primary colours from Danessa Myriks are a must have for your kit as they can mixed with any other colours to get the shades you want! my favourite yellow eyeshadow!!!

title: best matte white that doesn't budge!
text: I love using Lift so much! it works as a mixing shade for other colours to create lighter or pastel shades. I also love using this as eyeliner and as mascara. Colourfix is waterproof so it wont budge when its on the lashes! an be used on the lips, cheeks, lips and as facepaint!

name: MayaSolis
title: The best product for glossy lid!
text: I truely believe that this is a must have product for every makeup artist. I think I have all of the colour and type of colorfix. But my favourite is this clear glaze. It’s the perfect clear gloss for glossy lid or lips. It stays on for a long time and it doesn’t feel sticky at all. I can’t do glossy lid with any other product but this one!

name: LoveOnomz
title: Magic in a Tube!!
text:
Beautiful shade of purple, super pigmented, not patchy at all, even tho it’s cream it does dry fast but you can still have a bit of play time with it depending on how fast you work. Super amazing for editorials! Love it!!
And if you are a working MUA like myself, this is a must have product in your kit honestly you’d be sold!

name: LoveOnomz
title: Who doesn’t love a good Orange!!
text:
My love for Colorfix knows no bounds honestly one of the most versatile product I own in my kit. Carrot top is most definitely an essential shade, 10/10 recommend! 
Love how this particular shade of Colorfix has multiple uses ( I use it as a liner, as blush; gosh it’s such a beautiful blush shade, as a corrector; yes you heard right, as an eyeshadow etc) basically the list is endless with this shade which is why I love it! 
The color does appear vivid but can also be worn sheer as well.  
I love using this shade on Medium to Deep skin, it goes on so beautiful and compliments their skin tones.

name: StarEtoile
title: Extraordinary
text: Extraordinary vibrant colors, high performance water resistant , makeup with this product is truly spectacular...I love it so much

name: PolinaPerminova
text: MUST HAVE for everyone who loves creative/editorial makeup. Very easy to blend, gives you great cover and stays on place all day.

name: sydneynoels
title: Colorfix Glaze Is a Must-Have
text: The Colorfix Glaze in “Clear” has an undefeated gloss formula. It plays well with other lip products, doesn’t leave my lips feeling heavy with too much product, and even stays well when I eat or drink. It’s a near-perfect universal gloss. Just remember: A little product goes a LONG way!

name: Angelleeartist3
title: Oh how I love Colorfix, let me count the ways!!!!
text: Colorfix is a waterproof pigment that comes in an array of colors and finishes and their uses are boundless!!!! Listen, from brows to eyes to lashes to concealer & foundation to blush to contour to bronzer to highlighter to lips….. the list it legitimately endless! Colorfix has saved many looks of mine! No matter what purpose you think you have in mind for colorfix, she’s going to blow your mind!!!!

name: Pablito162
title: The best metallic blue.. PERIODT!
text: A true blue and somewhat turquoise fantasy. Honestly the metallic payoff of this baby is killer!! Everyone loved my makeup. The best part is it stayed after sweating and dancing a whole night. Still shocked …

name: marianadae
title: Mix it up and WOW
text: Don’t be afraid. This is a MUST in any kit. It can be applied even with your fingers and the result is always WOW. Last all day(and night), so versatile and you can change it up any way you wish by just mixing. Such a winner product!!

title: Glossy must have
text: I am absolutely obsessed with Colourfix Clear glaze!! You can use it on the eyes or the lips for a super comfortable, non sticky glossy look! I especially love using this when I am doing editorial make up as it gives you that amazing glossiness and high impact in seconds.

name: makeupbyviviana
title: Colorfix is it!
text: Love colorfix! Game changer in the beauty world. I hardly use my powder eyeshadow because I’m always reaching for my colorfix!

name: precious4anyone
title: nicely pigmented but make sure you blend quickly
text: I have this orange color as well as Milky way which is a white shimmer. both are bold colors. both are flattering on deep/dark skin tones as long as you know how to coordinate the colors of your makeup.  I will also say that when applying quickly blend the shadow because it does dry down quickly. the orange does run a bit patchy BUT start with a small amount on Lid and then blend out and it will look nice. ive posted 2 pictures. one of me wearing the orange matte with the blue Victoria Beckham eyeliner. the other picture is of me wearing milkyway with a dark blue Nude stix matte shadow .

name: JasmyneElise
text: This is the perfect deep purple. It’s more of a Concord grape… Not too red or raisin hue. It gives a hint of metallic shimmer and dries down quickly. It doesn’t move! Gotta love it!

name: Angelinambeauty
title: A must have!
text: ColorFix Clear Glaze is the #1 most used product in my makeup kit. It's super high shine without being sticky or heavy. This is the secret to the perfect editorial glossy eye! I also use it often for glossy lips or a wet look cheek glow.

name: MT0428
title: Primary Red ColorFix
text: I absolutely love DM ColorFix pigments. The colors so bold and long lasting . They are so easy to apply and blend . I love that with that these multitasking products can be applied on eyes , lips and cheeks. I own every single color and I will never go without in my professional makeup kit….

name: JasmyneElise
title: The Perfect Orange
text: Sis, you need this! I use this for everything. I use it as a blush, color corrector, lipstick, transition for my crease and eyeshadow too! Just get it! Now!

title: Best matte black eyeshadow and eyeliner
text: The best matte black eyeliner and eyeshadow I've ever used! this is the only product that doesn't budge in the waterline which is amazing! Great for eyeliner, smokey eyes and creative make up. The best bit is there are no fall out. A must have for the kit. I'd recommend working quickly with this product as it sets quickly

name: iamluca94
title: Colorfix game changer
text: Colorfix is a game changer since I have colorfix I don‘t use powder shadows anymore because the pigment will be never at the same level like colorfix. And the best part of it is the endless options using it. By the way exposed is perfect to contour the face on fair skin tones. Once you go colorfix you never go back to traditional eye shadows.

name: kirichmua
title: My perfect multifunctional product
text:
My favourite liquid shadow!!
I luv every formula of colorfix, especially neons and glosses. They dry fast, stay long and never leave me in a rain cause they’re 100% waterproof. They are really pigmented so I need only one drop of product to make a whole look (perfect product for one drop challenge btw). Also they are very multifunctional, I can use em as a liner, as an eyeshadow, as a lipsticks, blushes, mascaras, even on my waterline! Everywhere. Also I love to mix metallics with the dew wet balm and make a custom highlighter. I add pictures with sum swatches and two looks where I used colorfix neons, mattes and glosses both on eyes and lips. Definitely gonna buy every shade one day

name: Marvelann
title: Brown Liner for the Win
text: The most perfect brown, I love using as a liner but also works amazing as a lip liner!

name: makeupbyemoney
title: Powerful Color
text: Once you buy these you’re addicted. I love the color & how it looks all over the face

name: kyleryanbeauty
title: liquid cream pigments that stay all day!!
text: Love colorfix! These liquid cream pigments are so good to use all around the face! I love using the shimmers for bridal makeup on eyes and love using the nube tones for lips, eyes and cheeks!! Love that they have different formulas for different finishes!!

name: pepperbeauty
title: BYE BYE EYESHADOW
text: There’s nothing on the market like colorfix, period! You can use it on eyes, lips and face. I know it may seem intimidating however I promise you, with some playing around you’ll get it in no time. Check out Danessa Myricks on Instagram for plenty of demonstrations within her IGTV or reels. One drop is all you need! You’ll never view doing your makeup the same again. All you’ll need is colorfix.

name: Djene
title: ONE STEP EYESHADOW
text:
This is your one stop shop! Eyes lips and cheeks. The power of three is Danessa’s rule and I’m here for it. I love a multi-use product that can do everything. Act as a lipstick , shadow and blush. Crease proof, smudge proof and fool proof! From graphic liners , to blush  to lip tints and lipstick. This is it ! 

Follow me @_djeneba on Instagram for more DMB recommendations.

name: Rachelrosem
title: Longwear and flattering
text: The perfect universal pink, longwear, waterproof and can use it on eyes lips and cheeks!

name: Lecookie
title: The possibilities are endless!
text: The possibilities are endless with this product! I use this on my eyes, lips and cheeks! It is so creamy, pigmented and light weight. It never creases and there are so many beautiful, vivid shades. I am never disappointed by Danessa Myricks products!

name: kelseyhbeauty1
title: lift is a must have have
text: I love lift to use to mix into other colours to create your own lighter shade or use as a shadow base to make your eyeshadow last longer and pop! Must have !

name: mcatmom
title: Wanted to love it, so much hype!
text: Unfortunately this product didn’t work for me at all.  Sticky, doesn’t dry down.

name: blessedandmixed
title: very faulty
text: I really wanted to love this picture until the top of the item dried and exploded in my car. The color was nice but I’m not happy about the car detail payment I have to make. The top the top of the item is faulty and broke off as well and should be changed. It exploded everywhere including on my son hair face and clothing. The product is a bit drying and the stains are extremely difficult to get off. I have to say this has never happened to me and I’m extremely disappointed

name: sweetscarlett16
text: Rebirth is such a beautiful color! The shine is so beautifu.

name: sasazz
title: Meh
text: Purple and too light for my skin tone. Also looks weirdly chalky when applied. Doesn’t smear after it dries though

name: RetroMellyB
title: Found this brand through Instagram!
text: The hype is real and Danessa Myricks Beauty Cream Pigment isn’t getting enough credit! Once blended in, the matte is a beautiful finish.  As far as being able to remove it, I had no issues removing the product. I used the Neutrogena makeup remover wipes and it came right off! I bought the black matte and I can’t wait to try the other colors!  I suggest buying the brush that Sephora recommends to get the perfect application.

name: claremarie
text: Holey disco ball eyes! I didn't realize what foil meant, but I like the glitter effect. This is a fun product!

name: jeanner
title: Beautiful blush with amazing staying power!
text: This is a wonderful product with amazing staying power. It is heavily pigmented and I originally bought the rose and it was way too dark for my light olive skin. I exchanged it for the latte and it’s much better for me and I am going to buy the lighter pink as well. Application is key and you only need a very very small amount and I dab it on to my cheeks with a sponge. I have never used a blush that actually stays on all day.

name: startovr
text: The pigment was great and the staying power was also lovely. Unfortunately there was a bit too much glitter fall out. It was not manageable. It also looked a lot more silver than beige, so much so that I thought I was sent the wrong color at first. I love another one of her shades, just not this one. I think I just found a dud.

name: AmberMarie8
title: HG Product
text: I just recently wrote a review on the color "Romance" and my thoughts still hold true for the shade "Celebration" (pictured below) as well as "Céme Brulee". They're all beautifully pigmented. The longevity of this formula absolutely amazes me! I can wear them on my eyes for 12+ hours without creasing, fading, or becoming gunky. (you know what I mean) I love the pinkier shades for my cheeks and lips too. They blend out seamlessly on the cheeks and just melt into my lips. This product is so versatile! I highly recommend you go check it out and find a shade/finish that you like and give it a try! You won't be disappointed!

name: Purpleishco
text: I didn’t know what to expect but I am very satisfied!

name: muanai
title: best multi product
text: I live in Ontario Canada I order this product Desert Rose and Venus. Both products came with in 1-2 weeks! I used them as eyeshadow, highlight, blush and lipstick. They work amazing and blends easily into my looks. It’s also fitting on my darker complexion. I would recommend for other makeup artist. The size is small and mattes quickly but the product quality is worth it.

name: KAM007
text: I have this in the shade Milky Way. It is without a doubt the sparkliest eye shadow I’ve ever used. Absolutely beautiful if that’s what you are looking for. Dries down completely and does not budge.

name: niccoletta
title: good colour, rubbish longevity
