text: comes right off.  pretty colour, but not anywhere even in the zip code of long-lasting.  i am not a fan of rampant unchecked colour transfer.

name: AmberMarie8
title: AMAZING!!
text: Beautifully pigmented, blends effortlessly, no creasing and no fall-out! This formula is absolutely amazing! It lasted all day long. Just a little bit goes a long way, so you're getting plenty of product for a really great price! I can't wait to purchase more colors!!

name: JaysFace
title: Perfect Pink!
text: i absolutely love this product. The pigmentation is incredible and it the perfect pink I've been searching for.

name: awholbert
text: Horrible. As soon as this touches your skin, it’s stuck and will not blend out.

name: stephroll2
title: must buy
text: Some of the best multiuse product. I’m in love with this brand and the product. Literally use a small dot and it’s enough for your eyes and cheeks. I love this for days I’m in a rush.

name: Kreb107
title: Recommend!
text: Love the way this goes on, doesn’t dry too fast so it’s blend able. Nice light shimmer

name: fanson
title: Careful with the reds
text: I was head over heels for this product upon first use. But as the day went on it started to bleed into the corners of my eyes as well as bottom las line. Not waterproof,  not in Arizona heat anyway. And then it left pink dye all around my eyes for DAYS after. I looked like I had an infection. Be very careful with the red and berry tones when using on the eyes or as eyeliner. I am trying out some of the less Intense shades and hope to have a better result. Genius product idea, maybe it’s just the reds that are a no go

name: bekclynn
title: Lasts more than 24 hours!
text: I love the trueness of the colors.  They stay put and show zero fade even after 24 hours, and I’m talking about while camping!  A bit tricky to remove and takes some patience and oil cleanser but I’ll take the long lasting eye color even with a little work for removal.  I have read several posts about the product drying out and I have not had that issue with the 6 colors I have.  The creams are not long lasting though and should be listed as a separate product.

name: seema2321
text: I mainly got this for wet look but didn’t realize i good or a lipgloss this is!

name: nickikristy
title: Obsessed!
text: I absolutely adore this for use on my lips and cheeks. Unlike the matte versions, this doesn't dry down and set, so it's very easy to work with and easy to blend on my cheeks. It's the perfect level of glossiness, a nice sheen without looking too shiny, and opaque while also being easy to blend. I like to use one of the matte colors on my lips, let it set, and then apply this over it.

name: iScottieC
title: Golden Goddess in Kit-Friendly Packaging
text: This product is amazing as it comes in many colors and mixes well with other cream and liquid products. This particular shade is perfect for deeper toned people looking to add a golden glow. When used to highlight under Temptu S/B Airbrush Foundation, it provided a very luminous “glow from within” and did not move. I was so impressed when it played well with the Master Mattes: Pro Lip to make a long-wearing lip color that didn’t budge for hours... despite the Jamaican heat, the bride’s first kiss, many drinks, and ultimately a nighttime swim. This is a kit essential for those looking to downsize their kit due to its many uses. Layer with Danessa Myrick’s Light Work 2: Highlighting Palette for a multidimensional metallic finish.

name: iScottieC
title: Dreamy! Magical! Kit Essential!
text: This product is amazing. Comes in many colors and mixes well with other cream and liquid products. When used to highlight under Temptu S/B Airbrush Foundation, it provided a very luminous “glow from within” and did not move. I was so impressed when it played well with the Master Mattes: Pro Lip to make a long-wearing lip color that didn’t budge for hours... despite the Jamaican heat, the bride’s first kiss, many drinks, and ultimately a nighttime swim. This is a kit essential for those looking to downsize their kit due to its many uses.

name: nikkicharlie
title: Check it out!
text: Love this so much! Highly recommend. Only con is at the end of the day, if not applied correctly, the color starts to slightly fade so apply a generous amount!

name: genart
title: worth it!
text: The colorfix last a long time. No matter if it’s matte or foil! The nude glazes are my go-to look for an added dewy complexion. There are a good shade of browns and nudes for everyone so you’ll guarantee find your match. It also glides on beautifully and I’m obsessed with DMB.

name: Poopface2
title: Messy, hard to work with, waste of money
text: This product is garbage. It is EXTREMELY difficult to work with. It dries very fast and unevenly. Even worse, the product was damaged; there was a clog in the tube and when I went to dispense, the applicator tip went flying off. Then I got to spend the next 30min cleaning up pink glitter goo from my carpet, shoes and clothes. It was also VERY difficult to clean up. Not only would I not recommend, I want my money back.

name: chloest
title: AMAZING
text: LOVE this product, this color, as well as any other Danessa Myricks products! She never misses the mark. I love this as a cream blush or mixed into some chapstick for a light lip flush.

name: abbyhegs
text:
I love this product! The shade ‘chocolate’ works as such a beautiful/unique eyeliner color
Pigment was easy to work with and opaque!

name: amybianca79
title: Wow!
text: This is so much better than I thought it would be. I have old crepey eyes, dry skin and I thought this would enhance the crepey texture of my eyelid. It does NOT, at all! It looks beautiful on, wears beautifully and is so easy to use. I’m glad I took a chance on these (I also bought goldmine), I will definitely buy more. These things are perfection!

name: sjcinca
text:
I wanted to absolutely fall in love with this, but found it more difficult to work with than other products that are supposed to be multi purpose like this. 

Pros: great pigmentation that you could easily build up, or sheer out (requires more effort, and potentially skill). The latte color is gorgeous, and flattering for a lot of skin tones and depths. 
Cons: it dries too quick to work with, and is unforgiving. I had to redo my makeup the first time I used it. The formula is matte, but was somehow slightly tacky after it dried on my cheeks. 

Overall I love the concept of this product, and the monochromatic looks you can achieve, and will continue to play around with it!

name: Jennijanks17
title: Amazing Color! No Transfer
text: In seconds of applying these matte colors set and have no transfer. I’ve eaten entire lunches and my lip color was left in tact. I am in love and will be purchasing more matte colors with the next big sales event in November! I love these small pancakes with their powerful punch of color and long wear coverage! Myricks is a genius

name: EmBrodsky
text: Absolutely love this product! I bought the wrong shade but ended up still loving it! Defs will be buying more colors!

name: startovr
text: I haven’t used this as a cheek or a lip pigment but it is 100% worth it even if you only use it as an eye shadow. Seriously perfect. Pigment is great. Easy to blend. Dries down and stays all day. I haven’t had any issues with shimmer fall out. I do one eye at a time bc this dries down quickly. Great for one-shadow eye looks. No one paid me to write this but someone should haha

name: sprout8080
title: Winning shadow!
text: Loving this after several uses. I have oily lids and issues with eyeshadows creasing, but this one stayed put all day. It goes on smoothly, dries quickly, blends easily and is buildable. Exposed is a great colour on my fair skin for every day wear with little muss. Now I just need to choose more colours!

name: candyangel420
text: The metallic was nothing like the matte. It went on patchy, it wouldn’t blend, it was very frustrating. I’m holding onto it to try and keep working, but my hopes are low.

name: NeiaB
text: I purchased this during the Sephora sale. This is one of the best formulas.  I must get more!! It did not move and lasted all day. This is a MUST!!

name: DeeInDenver
text: Beautiful for a inner corner highlight! I do have to set the product if I use it on my eyelid.

name: smooney
title: Very pretty! Can’t really be worn alone though
text:
The color Titanium in real life looks exactly like the pictures on here! It is really stunning in person, partially because it’s more sparkly and less of a true metallic - there are discernible glitter particles in there but it goes on the eye completely smooth. I’m happy with the lasting power, however I didn’t like how this blended out with a fluffy brush, because it sends sparkles everywhere all over the eye. I need to try blending out with a finger but that’s not my preferred method. 

I will say, if you’re looking for something similar to the Charlotte Tilbury pots, this is NOT like that. It’s more liquidy and definitely a “foil” as described and not like a metallic. So keep that in mind!

Additionally, this isn’t something I would wear by itself because it’s a big too full-on not to have something more matte and deeper to “ground” it.

name: Halama
title: SO SO SOOOOO GOOOOOD!!!
text: This is amazing. Super pigmented and blends beautifully. The color Exposed is perfect for bronzing/contouring. I will definitely be purchasing more colors.

name: redhair911
title: Nice formula too dark.
text: Nice product, very pigmented. Very. This color is too purple and dark for my coloring.

name: Mariamei
title: Versatile use
text:
First time trying this product and best thing I did 
It’s so versatile and easy to work with blend so well and last all day .

name: Ispend2much6
title: Wow!
text:
I can't think of another product that will give you more bang for your buck- $18 for this tube that will probably last for months.  The shades are simply gorgeous!  This shade was very comfortable on the lips, and very smoothing- it did not accentuate any lip lines.  I'll be buying more.
In the picture below, the shades are Wild Orchid, Latte, and Macaron. The swatches are Latte on the left, Macaron on the right.

name: Kimmybella
title: Lips look better than usual
text: I love this so much, gorgeous color for my cheeks and lips! It made my lips look better somehow and the color really complements my skin tone

name: divadivine
title: Amazing
text: I don't think I can say enough good things about the Colorfix Pigments.  They are not lacking in color.  They layer well with each other and with other brands of cream based shadows.  The finish isn't cakey.  Most importantly, a little goes a LOOOOOONG way.  You can apply them with your finger or a brush.  If you use a brush, just make sure to clean it right after or the bristles can get stiff.  You do get some time to actually blend the pigment but once it dries, it's not budging.

name: ObsessedLippy
title: First Class
text:
I knew about this brand before it came to Sephora.  I even purchased things from her website directly.

All the products I own from this brand are used constantly.  I like a product that is usable for many purposes.  All the Creams fit the Bill.

Sometimes in a rush I don't even bother with a lip pencil.  I just take me finger swipe this over my lips and out the door.  

They make for great eyeshadows, cheek color or even highlighter.

I can't wait to see what she produces. next.

name: pisces32
text: Absolutely Beautiful I own 2 colors and I want them all so beautiful long lasting color!!

name: peaceandloveca
text: WOW.  CHOCOLATE!   THIS COLOR IS B.E.A.U.T.I.F.U.L!  It is a beautiful deep dark burgundy wine color vs the actual color of chocolate.   Think of it as a vampy dark burgundy color. This tube will last FOREVER!  I use very little on the corner of my eyelid as an accent and all I need is a tiny bit, like a size of an nant!  I put just a dot on my lips and it was GORGEOUS!   It is really pigmented and although it is matte, it is not drying.  It is very opaque.  On the lips it is staining and works nice with gloss.  It's a great winter color.  I am a light medium tan color with black hair if this helps anyone.

name: Susan93
text: Overhyped and not sure why. I got two colors and I’m extremely disappointed in them. I tried to use magnetic as an eyeliner since the color is gorgeous. But it kept transferring and I had fall out which was strange. I tried using it on its own as a cream shadow and it kept on creasing. I tried many different ways to make this work and it wouldn’t. I used eyeshadow primer, set the primer with powder, set the wing with powder, didn’t layer the wing (color wasn’t as pigmented). I don’t have oily lids and never experience creasing unless I’ve been outside for a couple hours in the heat. I never left the house when I was testing this product out.

name: MarilynDMakeup
title: Chocolate is not neutral more very deep burgundy
text: I am happy with the texture. When working with thicker layers the colour is closer to brown BUT if you use thin layer or when blending to diffuse the colour... be ready to see burgundy. This colour is not a neutral deep brown. It’s more like a very deep burgundy the red undertone is strong in this pigment. I am only giving 4 stars because there was no colour specification on the website mentionning this important details. The images are showing more of a neutral brown. My rating has nothing to do with the formula of this product. I am exited to finally add Danessa Myricks in my pro makeup kit. I didn’t have the chance to used them a lot to give a better feedback. NOTE, if you are a colour mixer : get a light colour like white. If I knew dessert was a darker shade of latte I would have got a white to create(mix) it instead of getting 2 colours that are that so closed. It would give you more possibility that way!

name: Angelreverse
title: SOLD!
text: I give this product full points. It is super pigmented and goes on pretty smoothly. I used my fingers and a brush the second time. I preferred application with the finger since it was much faster and went on pretty tight. It had a Matt finish and did not crease. Weirdly enough it didn’t transfer either and stayed in place even without a primer. I’m pretty sure this is going to be a staple on my vanity forever.

name: beauty2212
title: Pretty but not long lasting
text: I like the color and it is really easy to use, but it is not long lasting at all. At the end of an 8h shift it is no longer on my eyes and I set it with eyeshadow or bronzer. I will continue to enjoy it but don't know if I would buy more of this finish.

name: Seema82
title: truly impressive product!
text: I purchased eight of these during the VIB sale. These are as excellent as the rest of the raving reviews say they are! Although these are not a new concept what I really love about these is that they dry down  in the same shade as what they appear as. I find for me personally that although they are pigmented I definitely don’t have enough when I used one tiny dot. I probably have to use two or three dots for opaque coverage. Also I completely disagree with some of the reviews that say that these dry down very quickly. Once you lay it down on your face you have a good 20 or 30 seconds to work with before they start drying down. However I suppose if you are only using one drop for a sheer wash of colour it will take less time to dry but it still wasn’t a problem for me personally. I was able to spread it to where I needed it to go. Make sure your Is is on tight because that will cause the issues that other people have that it dries out. Also if you like these there are so many more shades on her website!

name: SheGlowsPale
title: I feel pretty..
text:
I own three of these - ballerina, romance, and goldmine. I’m also excited to try Alien when it’s back in stock. These are awesome and versatile. Ballerina is my far my favorite. Its a light sheer pink, and I love it as an eyeshadow wash and a highlighter. It does have micro shimmer, but I don’t know what type shimmer danessa myricks uses in this but it’s basically magical..it’s obviously shimmer, which I usually stay away from especially in highlighters (I prefer pearlized over actual shimmer particles) but like I said it’s just this magical micro shimmer that just makes me feel so pretty without feeling like a 12 year old throwing glitter on her cheek. It’s like grown up fairy shimmer lol
As far as the other two colors - Romance is kind of like a darker version of ballerina but pearlized instead of actual shimmer particles., it actually makes a pretty blush. And goldmine - really pigmented shimmery gold, very pretty, and very pigmented! But it’s SLIGHTLY olive toned which I don’t love in my gold makeup, I prefer a yellow/bronzey gold but still a great formula just not the right color for me.

These stay put as soon as they dry down, better then any other liquid eyeshadow I’ve tried. But work fast!

name: LCothren
title: Clear, natural cheek colour
text: I initially didn't like this but I've come to appreciate what it does.  Used as a blush, it lasts quite a long time and gives a clear, natural-looking colour. On the lips it doesn't last long, I find, but that's rue of all glosses.  I do like that you can match lip and cheek colours.  I've ordered a couple of eye shadow colours and I'm eager to see how they turn out.  The price is unbeatable, too

name: scout2u
title: Pretty, But Sticky & Wet
text: I have the matte formula of this in Creme Brulee. i use a TINY dot of it on my cheeks under powder blush. You have to blend it very fast or it sets in a spot. I was hoping this would be similar. I am looking for an easy product to slap a light layer of sparkle on my eyes and go. This is pretty. It has a sparkle base and holographic glitter. However, it is wet and sticky. It does not dry down. I tried it over my regular 24 hr shadow base and it was still wet and sticky. The glitter also falls out all over. My face looked like a disco ball in under 30 minutes. Not good for contact wearers. I could see this being pretty as a highlighter on cheekbones for a special occasion, but that is not what I wanted so back it goes.

name: Kyleyak
text: This is so so beautiful and easy to use. It pretty much does the work for you. It’s a great one and done eye look and It dries down, doesn’t crease, and I haven’t noticed any wear-in or wear-off. I love it and definitely recommend it.

name: momoftwo99
title: Impressive product.
text: I purchased Desert Rose because I was looking for an all purpose product. I use the tiniest dot amount for each eye, lips, and cheeks because it is very pigmented. It’s blends out easily and looks amazing as an eyeshadow, blush, and lip colour using only my finger. I do use a lip balm underneath on my lips for extra hydration. For ref: NC40 sensitive skin with eczema and dry patches. It did not irritate my skin. It’s a small tube but you only need the tiniest amount so this tube will last a very very long time. Impressive product!

name: LoveCirice
title: Color did not last
text: The color was super pretty when it first went on, but after a couple of hours the pink color wore away and I was just left with silver glitter all over my eye. It did crease a tiny bit but I have slightly hooded eyes so that is to be expected.

name: dkitty1
title: amazing
text: This has great pigment! I used the cream and then applied the clear gloss over it. I love it! The gloss makes it super shiny.

name: Tracy10s
title: Impressive
text: This product is phenomenal. I can’t imagine how long this will last because it’s so highly pigmented. Like a tiny pin drop will give you more than enough for both eyes. There’s a bit of a learning curve, but once you play with it, you’ll be blown away. I’m 46 & what worked for me in my 20’s & 30’s doesn’t work now. Cream products are my new go-to’s. I’ve purchased 2 of these so far & have a feeling I’m just getting started.  For the price point & quality, this cannot be beat.

name: marierichard
title: Chocolate is more burgundy
text: Love the product, great color payoff and only slight creasing at the end of a long day, but I'm unsure if I received the right color? It says chocolate on the package and product, but is most definitely not a chocolate brown. More of a burgundy. It's still lovely but I wish I would have gotten the right color.

name: RoxanneY
title: Very Versatile
text: Beautiful all around product to use on eyes, cheeks and lips!

name: brieone
text: This is a lovely product. I have known of Danessa Myricks for years in the makeup community, even had a chance to attend one of her classes at a hair show. The idea of an affordable, versatile eye, cheek and lip pigment is very on trend especially with the “my skin but better” trend.  One star off because the colors in the tube and swatches are not true. Chocolate and Desert Rose are much more red than brown.

name: nikkimaria
title: Latte Sweet Pink ❤️
text:
This is an awesome product! Love that I can use it on my eyes lips and cheek! Very monochromatic look! 
This is the only matte that I have from her and I will be buying more. I prefer the mattes to the sparkle ones in this line. Long lasting great quality

name: discowitch
title: HOLY MOLY!
text: This stuff is just...amazing. The color Titanium has some teal reflect to it which I wasn't expecting (thought it was gonna be straight up silver), but is totally welcome. One tiny dab will do, but I couldn't help but apply more than just that BECAUSE IT'S SO SPARKLY. Stuck on my lids (with primer) just fine for several hours until I removed it. (I still have a swatch on my hand, even after several washes!) Not sure how I'd use it besides on my eyes, but could make for a neat lipstick topper. SO much bang for your bucks with this product. Excited to try the other color I purchased, "Rocket"!

name: tttay
title: STUNNING
text:
QUEEN Danessa Myricks. I absolutely love this. It goes on very well and doesn't crease and lasts all day. I love the idea of eyeshadow but always have a hard time finding the right shade of eyeshadow for me to not make me look like a crazy person. This is it. It's light enough that I can add it to my daily look. 

The only con is the packaging, the product squeezes out of the tube without any pressure, causing it to get messy.

name: QuadaMeg
title: SO GOOD!
text: I was very hesitant in trying this product, but wow I am blown away! Strong pigment but easily blended out. All I did for my look was apply the Colorfix, blend out, and add a glittery shade on the lid. Definitely getting in more colors!

name: tikotiko
title: Ballerina
text: Ok people    this is a great shade    the prettiest pink I have ever seen  I'm in love with this one    this is   my 2nd shade from her collection   it's  beautiful chrome soft pink  smooth doesn't crease   it's just such a pretty shade not your typical shade of pink    so happy I chose this color

name: ShiyuD
title: Deserves the 5 stars!
text: I can see why this is an award winner. I can't wait to try other colors. The color is as shown but seems a little darker when you put it on unless you spread it very thin. I only needed a drop the size of a pin head for each eye.The staying power is incredible and easily lasts all day with no smudging, smearing or wear. It blends easily with the ABH powder eye shadow I use along with it.

name: panicmedusa
title: pretty glitter but it's pure glitter
text: This shade is gorgeous don't get me wrong. If you wear and love glitter around your eyes you will love this. It has good staying power and has little fallout once dry. However I am really over glitter especially in eye products with no eye area disclaimer. I'm a contact wearer and this did not mix well with them. It's a shame because I really do love the mattes and wanted to be able to use the foil and metallics.

name: SISIWHO
title: Amazing
text: I love this pigment. I’ve been looking for the right colour of red to use as eyeshadow and Ive finally found it!!!! I’m going to buy other shades

name: girlgvng
title: the only product you’ll ever need!
text: This is by far the best cream product I have ever used.  I have been using DMB products since before they launched in Sephora & have been in love ever since.  Don’t listen to the reviews that are only giving it a lower rating because it dries too fast or it’s too hard to blend... It’s a waterproof product- therefore you must work quickly in small areas at a time... & please...if you’re not accustomed to this kind of product, don’t squirt the tube directly on your face.  Work from your hands or a palette.  You WILL experience issues with this product if you use too much or if you work too slow.  I use a rice grain amount for both eyes & blend with a brush, starting with most of the pigment on the lid & blend while using short, downward strokes for a smokey look. It lasts all day, even as a eyeshadow base.  I urge you to check out Danessa’s IG or DMB university if you need inspiration or a tutorial.  I’m so overjoyed to finally see these products in Sephora!

name: lilmew
title: worth it!
text: This line is the definition of everything I love in makeup. It’s just so ridiculously useful in a multitude of ways. I got multiple shades and love them all, but I really wanted to take note of this clear gloss. As much as I love the glossy lid look, I never bought any lid gloss because I just didn’t see it as actually being wearable, wearable in the sense that I mean I thought it’d just be a creasy slide-y mess. This really wasn’t the case! I wore this on top of exposed in particular, and it actually wore really really well. Not sure how it’s work on top of powder, but it works beautifully on top of her other shades! Also used it as a highlight topper, and that’s a move.

name: megbrownie24
title: Glitter!
text: This shade is more pure glitter with some pigment, a little harder to work with than the regular metallics but so beautiful I can’t dock a star. So sparkly! And stays in place!

name: slub2003
title: Glitter
text: Unfortunately I don't like the shimmers. They are very glittery. Maybe mats are better.

name: JennsBeautyRoom
title: One & Done 11 Hour Shadow!
text: Was so impressed that the shade "Rocket" lasted 11+ hours on my oily lids. A little goes a long way, so this tube will last me for ages. It does dry down very quickly, so I had to work fast, but for a one and done eye shadow I really can't complain. Already picked up more shades.

name: MaddyJ8
title: Excellent gloss
text: This is the best gloss I have ever tried, I will be using this all the time now! I have super sensitive skin and lips and so in the past the only lip product I can use without my lips getting eczema was fenty lip paint but the fenty lip paints are very bold and sometimes I just want a chill lip look. So I'm so glad I found this clear gloss because it's my new favorite product. I also purchased latte for my eyes and that one is a little harder for me to work with because I'm not very good with blending or moving fast. But I'm definitely going to buy more of the glosses I really hope more gloss colors come out.

name: Marjac1920
text: I have this in Nebulizer, Exposed, Chocolate, and Rustic and every color is amazing. It’s easy to apply and lasts all day long. My eyelids get oily and it doesn’t crease!

name: Claufine
title: disappointed
text:
Sticky and difficult to blend on to skin. Weird product.
I was disappointed after reading all the glowing reviews. Still can’t figure out the hype. I’ve tried to use it several times but it never seems to work. I think the issue is that it dries so fast.

name: Teashy
title: Great wear and coverage
text: I love this! It was my first try with a cream shadow - its a nice golden yellow shade and dries matte (no streaks!) I can get away with only one coat for the coverage I want, and it wears all day no problem! I will definitely be buying more colours in this, and I hope they make a more neon yellow, because this is more of a golden/sunflower yellow.

name: ElenaDm
title: upset
text: I got so excited when I saw that this product finally arrived at Sephora ! I ordered it right away . As a makeup artist, I’ve never felt so weird and disappointed using the product. The colour is super intense for my light skin , also the formula doesn’t blend at all, no matter how fast I try to blend it . I tried to use it as a blush, but a tiny bit of product clogged my pores. Will be returning it

name: slub2003
title: If you like glitter
text: Nice duo chrome shade but way to glittery for me. It dries fast on the lids and has good staying power.

name: HeatherInBoston
title: Beyond gross
text: I don't know how this won an award. It's incredibly sticky and difficlult to blend. I tried it twice and ended up tossing it. Save your money.

name: JG3000
title: Pretty but tricky
text:
Pretty and fairly easy to blend out, although quite tacky and pigmented. 
Pros: if you blend fast enough and layer to get desired colour it does last all day and doesn't crease (with eye primer)
Cons: Tube seems to dry out and clump fast, even though brand new. So pigmented, you need to be careful bc once on...it's on!

I also got the clear topper to make a wet eye look. Even with primer, I always get a terrible crease and goopy look in an hour...so no it's not crease proof, but it does look cool for a bit. I recommend using that one for gloss or maybe a wet highlighter (although this is sticky like gloss - so not on windy days)

name: MKhamkhay
text: After reading such glowing reviews I had such high hopes and thought this would perform differently than all of the face/eye glosses on the market. I layered the gloss on top of another matte color fix pigment on my eyes. I unfortunately experienced the same things as I do with every gloss that ive tried; immediate transfer, tackiness, and only temporary dewiness. In the future I will stick to just using this as a highlighter.

name: trishnaa
title: creme de la creme
text: Hyped product for a reason. This has got to be the most perfect color selection & is so user-friendly. Blends like a dream!!

name: Liz3541
title: amazing
text: Amazing texture and staying power. Love the quality and color.

name: gbaum
text: Holy lord. This has serious pigment and staying power! You do have to blend very quickly because after it sets, it’s not moving - never seen another product like this. Incredible.

name: qwertysv
text: Definitely pigmented. Just not terrible useful on cheeks. When they say you only need a dab, believe them. The *tiniest* dot is unworkable on fair skin, unless you’re going for a clown-like appearance. Formula works a bit better on eyelids, but this particular shade makes me look like I’ve been rubbing my eyes.  Can see how this could work for creative folks with time to play, but if you’re looking for a quick solution for your morning routine, this isn’t it.

name: scout2u
title: Excellent For Adding A Flush To My Cheeks
text: One tiny, tiny dot adds a nice heathy flush to my cheeks. A really tiny dot or I look like a doll. I don’t find this useful on the lips. It wears unevenly and settles into the lines on my lips. I haven’t tried it as eyeshadow. Knocked off a star. If you don’t blend it FAST it ends up spotty and streaky.

name: sexyabelincoln
title: For lips it’s OK
text: Since the start of the pandemic I’ve been searching for a really bold red lipstick I can wear under a mask. This isn’t it (in primary red). It reminds me a lot in terms of feeling and longevity of the KVD liquid lipsticks. It needs to be blotted and it still transfers after that—not appropriate for mask wear. It’s almost as if it doesn’t completely set even after hours. Other than that it’s a perfect true red, does last a long time, and it is super pigmented. You only need a tiny amount for your whole lips—I imagine this would overall be very economical if you get a few primary colors and mix your own.

name: barbieqsumm
title: Dries out waaaaaaaay fast
text: I loved this product at first. It really is a great product. I was so excited about it that I bought almost all of the colors. Little did I know that most of them would dry out so fast. I’m very disappointed. They aren’t even usable. Such a waste of money.

name: SparkleNshine34
title: LOVE Love LOVE!!!
text: Absolutely beautiful! Easy to work with and buildable for a subtle wash or deeper pigment. I can’t wait to try more from this brand!!!

name: ckbmom
title: Great Neutral Color
text: Absolutely lovely - a great neutral color for my lips and eyes.  Much better than the foil, which would not go on evenly and just looked strange.

name: ckbmom
title: Disappointed
text: The color is on target but something is weird about the formula.  Does not go on evenly at all.  I will be returning it.

name: JaninaJolie
title: I Received “dried out” products. Never used.
text:
Plastic Packaging is Defective! The color primary Yellow arrived to me completely dried out and after being sent another one, That one dried out in 2 months,  Along with 4 other shades. 

Unfortunately I invested  $300 in this product because of all the good things I heard.

 For and good example if you have any experience using MUFE Aqua xl color paints and Their Aqua brow paints . Those would last no less than 12 months plus...

I’m really disappointed in how cheap and unreliable  the packaging is

Please fix the packaging.

name: midnightwithme
title: Super Pigmented
text: Wow! This product is super pigmented and stays on all day without creasing! I have exposed and celebration and definitely plan to buy more!

name: beautyholic90
text:
It is good. In my opinion:
- It is sticky (I think it's supposed to be sticky to have wet finish looking). It will never dry down completely. And will catch my hair (that's why I took 1 star off)
- With makeup, it makes my skin look super good and healthy, even under the sunlight. 
- I don't like using it without makeup cause it doesn't cover anything.
- Clear shade has no glitter. It goes give truly glass skin looking. I also use it as lip gloss.
- I feel it has thick texture but it gives me no feeling on my face.
- It doesn't ruin my foundation or lipstick or eye shadow.
- I don't think it is waterproof 100%. But it does help a lot with sweat.
- I find this one easier to use than Dew wet balm.

name: PandaB003
title: Ok...really not what I was hoping for.
text: On the fence about this one. I don't wear a lot of eye makeup. Want to purchase this a maybe a one and done loon. Dries really fast and "Exposed" looked really muddy on my tan skin. Maybe will try as a lip cream or blush. I can see why folks who are into makeup would like this product though.

name: stephroll2
title: best multi tasking product on the market
text: This product should be viral it is so good. The shade is a gorgeous pinky mauve and very pigmented. It’s matte yet it’s creamy, lightweight and easy to use. I definitely will be ordering more shades once the sale starts.

name: GreatKate
title: underwhelming
text:
After this product flooded my Instagram Feed, I bought the Clear Glaze hoping to achieve the wet/glossy look. 

Unfortunately, it wasn't what I expected. It could be user error, but the glaze just wouldn't work. For my eyes, it was sticky and heavy, creased after minutes, and my mascara kept transferring. I tried with and without primer, but after only 2 hours of wear I had to take it off. For cheeks and lips, I wasn't blown away by the gloss it gave. I would recommend the line's Dew Wet Balm for a highlighting/gloss effect instead.

name: Ketzzie
text: Nice but it’s too red to be called chocolate, the color is more like a burgundy.

name: WendyHarris
title: Hello pigment!
text: Just a pinch goes a long way!!!! Mixes well with other products like glosses for the lips. Used as eyeliner top lids....just wow! Comfortable nice matte finish but not drying.

name: JaninaJolie
title: Buyers beware! The plastic packaging is Defective!
text:
Buyers beware!

The plastic packaging is Defective! cheap plastic Tubes That does not keep the product from drying out.

name: LCothren
title: It's lip gloss
text: The colours are pretty but it's not really appropriate for cheeks.  It's just a lip gloss, quite sticky and hard to apply on cheeks.  The colour doesn't last long, either. I'll use it up but I won't be buying it again.

name: Ippy
text: I have about 8 or 9 from this line now. It’s magic! Goes on smooth but blendable. And it stays on all day. Love mixing and adding glazes.

name: kait46
text: Awful. So pigmented it’s hard to work with even with a tiny dab I got way too much colour and looked like a 5 year old who just slapped bright pink all over their face. It was really nice for the lips, ok for the eyes, but I bought it for the main blush aspect and hated it. You have .5 to blend in and i don’t even have dry skin I have oily so thought I’d appreciate the matte aspect but it was just NOT good. Will be returning

name: FowlMari
title: love it
text: Absolutely must have. It goes on silky and lasts forever. I use it as an eyeliner. It does take a learning curve. But overall worth it. I’m getting more colors

name: meggy75
title: nah
text: I was super excited about this but it’s impossible to spread when putting it on to cheeks or eyes, it comes gushing out of the tube and it’s very very messy. I’m bummed bc the color is pretty

name: bobbymc
text: Purchased the clear glaze.  Love it.  Plan on trying the colors.

name: verge
title: Kaleidoscope, I don’t see it
text: I have a few of the other colors which I really like.  This color is a dud.  It is clear with a few specks of glitter hear and there.  I thought it would be more of a frost like, not clear glue with very few glitter speckles.

name: kells77
text: I bought Creme Brûlée and black and love them both!  Creme Brûlée is great on eyes, cheeks and lips, and lasts a long time, and the black has a lot of used. I’m using it as eyeliner and it’s also great to use a small angled brush to fill in any white space on the top last line and to waterline. Danessa Myricks products are awesome.

name: jaclynfoo
title: Love Most and Dislike Some!
text:
I bought 5 shades of Colorfix after being a huge Danessa fan and was finally excited to get to show the product! I got Exposed, Creme Brulee, Ballerina Chocolate and Milky Way. I love love the first three, the formula is creamy and wonderful. Stays all day and I put them straight into my kit! 
The price is wonderful, no complaints there. It’s super versatile. 

However, Chocolate is actually not reaallly a chocolate shade IMO, it’s more a dark red, maroon. Which wasn’t what I was looking for. And Milky Way was the only foil one, I got, the consistency was much thinner than the others and I don’t know if I got a defective one but it separated on the lids, and did not stay on at all. It flaked all over my cheeks and I did not like it. I may try another foil formula again but I returned Chocolate and Milky Way. So I gave it a 4. 

TDLR; Mattes are great formula, Foil formula sucked for me, Chocolate isn’t a well represented shade name, overall a good price and stays well.

name: karokaro
title: Color me impressed
text:
I bought two colors: Rocket and Goldmine, both foil/glitter. And I'm kind of blown away. The color payoff is intense, and very very little will go a long way. A dab the size of a sesame seed is enough for both eyelids, so you can use it very sparingly. 

Staying power is pretty good, but there was some creasing after a full day of wear and dance class. Not unreasonable.

The texture when dry reminds me of the ILIA liquid eyeshadows. ILIA has better staying power, but the colors end up much more muted and matte than you would expected once they dry down. The Colorfix pigments absolutely outperform ILIA on color intensity and lasting shimmer, and of course color selection, especially if you wanted a bolder look.

I swatched them together for comparison. On the left are ILIA in Sheen and Colorfix in Goldmine, and ILIA in Dim and Colorfix in Rocket.

I will definitely try more colors and look forward to trying out blending my own shades.

name: karibe
title: Winged Liner Game Changer!
text: I have been struggling to find a consistent black liner that would work as an eyeliner to line my eye and water line, as well as help me to effortlessly achieve a winged liner. I’ve tried gel liners, pencil liners and liquid liner. I fell in love with the Pat McGrath Labs liquid liner but I needed something that would stay put all day, especially because my inner corner waters throughout the day. I saw Blackout and thought... hmm, I wonder if it would also work as a liner. Let me tell you it is phenomenal! It’s perfect because I can apply it with a thin liner brush, so I have control over the application. It’s waterproof and doesn’t budge after drying down. It’s perfect for a sharp pointy inner corner and it actually stays put with my oily skin and watery water line. Obviously you can use it as a shadow for a smokey eye, to blend and darken other shades, and even to shape eyebrows! This product is such a game changer.

name: jennrpeters
text: Stunning colour, doesn't budge. You just need a little on the eyelid and I also put a little bronzer in my crease, perfect easy look!

name: ursamajor
title: Versatile product
text: I have used Celebration as an eyeshadow, a wash of colour across my lips, and as a contour colour. It can be built up or buffed out and plays well with other products (eg clear gloss, powder eyeshadows, set foundation). My favourite way to use it is to tap a little bit of it into some cream blush and do a classic “drape” on my cheeks for colour and contour all at once. I love putting some on a fluffy brush and just going all around the eye for a super easy grunge look that makes blue eyes pop. Very unique product and a little bit goes a long way. I will definitely be trying some more colours in the future.

name: sparkleandflex
text:
didn't stick! either I'm using it wrong or product just isn't for me which really sucks because I was sooooo excited for it. it just seemed sticky. even with a tiny drop I couldn't get it to set and dry on my skin.
 even with primer, eyeshadow, eyeshadow even over top to try and dry it when it still was sticky... and setting spray.. Maybe I got a bad tube? I really wanted matte black but figured with eyeshadow and this it would still give me the same dark smokey look I was hoping for... it looked smokey sure.. but it was sticky all day :(
if I figure out how to use it I without this issue, I will change my review. I've only tried it twice so far.

name: FowlMari
title: love it!
text: Absolutely love it!!! The formula is very creamy enough to work with it before it dries. I wanted some colored eye liners that are long lasting and this works well for that!! I created a wing with it and it lasted all day.  No smudges or fading or smearing. I’m happy. I love this color as well. I’m definitely picking up more colors!

name: Kaymae1789
text: This is so good on oily eyelids! Gorgeous one and done color or layer a glitter or shimmer on top. Perfection! Wish she would come out with more colors.

name: GG84
title: Missed the Mark
text: I wanted to love this product. I read tons of reviews and visited DMB website before making my purchase, I was sure Colorfix was going to be the product for me based on the photos and rave reviews. I was looking for a clear shade to give a glossy look when I do a Smokey eye. I couldn’t get this to work without shifting my eye make up (tried powder/cream shadow with primers), it made an absolute nightmare of my mascara and just over all was not the product for me.

name: IARO
text: Love these products. I have colorfix in rustic, carrot top and latte. Only need a tiny amount because the pigmentation is SO GOOD. A little goes a long way! I use all these colors for multi-purpose make up. Eyes, lips, cheeks. No caking and not sticky either. Really great product.

name: Poptart40
title: Gorgeous all in one product!
text: I initially bought Exposed and Creme Brulee to try. I was blown away by the versatility and longevity of these pigments! A tiny drop goes a long way. Then I discovered Romance. I'm in love! The color is great on eyes, cheeks and lips. It lasts all day, even after I go walk my dog while sweating in 80 degree weather! I have since bought the Vision Cover Foundation/Concealer and the clear glaze to top the Romance lip look.. DMB is becoming my go to brand for one and done makeup!

name: red71dee
title: meh
text: Just gloss with glitter. Nothing great. I won’t buy again.

name: ashleymermaid
title: leaky
text: I opened the package and it was completely sticky. the whole thing had leaked. I'm so sad because I love Danessa and this just wasn't it.

name: verge
title: Long lasting eyeshadow
text: This is a nice formula.  It goes on creamy and dries to a powder.  Easy to apply. Lasts a long time without budging. Latte is a little more brown than pink to me.  I also have Valentine which is a very bright pink.

name: Emeraldeyes529
title: Shade Venus looks similar to Alien
text: This looks gorgeous on the eyes.  I bought Venus & it is very much a duochrome or even multichrome with shifts from orange to deeper pink & in between.  It is so sparkly & reminds me of my Clionadh multichrome eyeshadows.  I love that there is enough time to work with it & sheer it out on the edges before it dries down.  I've tried going back over it with a 2nd coat for even more opacity & that looks great too.  This foiled shade is very very sparkly and textured, so if you are into that sort of thing - you will love it.  I also tried to sheer some out on my lips and that looked great with a clear gloss (from Tower28) over top of it.  Now, I did read some reviews saying that these bottles dry out - even with the cap bring on snug - and if that day comes I will truly be disappointed.  But so far this is a ☆☆☆☆☆ purchase.  I am looking at getting a matte 1 & glossy 1 to try those formulas too.

name: tikotiko
title: Exspose
text: I received this product today   nd oh my  love the color the formula  everything  about it    so soft and all u need is a drop and the coverage  is beautiful  soft    sexy    natural

name: shaundra
title: Awesome Versatile Product
text: The colorfix pigments are amazing! I use them on my lips and eyes. It's worth the price because of the versatility. You get to use this product multiple ways instead of buying blush, a lip product and/or eyeshadow separately. ..u just Need one product that does it all...U need this!

name: winkle
title: not crease proof if you have oily lids.
text: I have oily lids this product was not crease proof lasted about 3.5 hours then transfered to my upper lid. I thought this would be the one sadly... on to the next!

name: julia412
title: Goldmine
text: Each of the Colorfix pigments is fantastically longwear and multi-use. Goldmine is great on its own  used as a liner or as a shadow. It’s a beautiful neutral gold that looks much warmer in the tube than it does on the skin (see photos for reference). The shimmer and reflect in this particular finish never disappoints!

name: ccruz718
title: My Zoom Meeting Looks just went up 10 notches
text: I was excited to see a new makeup brand launch for a black woman owned business. I bought 2 color fix pigments but Alien took my breath away. Just a unique peachy orange color with gorgeous crystal glitter. Would look gorgeous anytime but I can see this complimenting a tan in the summer. Swatched on my hand (last color) but the picture doesn’t do it justice.

name: jluney
title: DRIES OUT AFTER 1 USE
text: These COMPLETELY dry out after 1 use. I even had a few I had never opened that also dried out. This is a HUGE issue and needs to be fixed. I love the color pay off but to only get one use out of a product is unacceptable

name: kayflorida
title: Titanium
text: Bought titanium and oil slick (which I reviewed separately).  Titanium goes on well, and a little goes a long way.  Color is gunmetal and on my light colored eyelids, it looks like it has a greenish cast to it.  It went on much thicker than oil slick, which I found runny.  And it's very sparkly, but in a good "non chunky glitter" way.  One thing...which is good but also not so good...is that it's very difficult to remove.  The only thing that removed it was my Lancome eye make remover, and even then it took a lot of scrubbing to get it off.  So, most likely, it will be on all day but you will need a good eye makeup remove to get it off.  I had no success with soap and water and Makeup Eraser towel.  In comparison, the oil slick color came right off very easily.

name: kayflorida
title: Oil Slick
text: I bought two shades, oil slick and titanium.  Oil slick seemed runny while titanium did not.  On the eyes, it was very dark and unforgiving; meaning I couldn't really sheer it out, so it looked too dark on my light colored skin.  Also, there are predominately red sparkles, but out of the tube they are large, sparse and not sparkly, like a Stila sparkle liquid eye shadow is (as in example).  I'm returning this color.  I'd only recommend if you are looking for a very dark black for your eyelids.

name: figgy2008
title: Outstanding product
text: I absolutely love this product. The clear I put over powder eyeshadow and it made it so pretty and it stayed without creasing. Used it as highlighter alone and over powder highlighter. This is one of the best makeup products I have ever bought. It only takes a drop of it to get the most beautiful effect that lasts, isn’t sticky and doesn’t pick up what’s underneath. Also, bought the cream brûlée color that is matte and it’s so versatile and gorgeous as well. I want all of these now. They are fun to use.

name: CakeSnob
title: I’m Torn...
text:
I discovered DMB last year and was blown away with most of her line.  Love at first sight!  I splurged and bought almost every shade of Colorfix.  Clearly a $500 investment!!!

Even purchased a special makeup acrylic holder to showcase them.  Tried a few and loved the dry down and full pigment of them.  Then...a month later I attempt to show a client how good they work and 6 were dried out...and I had never even opened it.  I sent (2) inquiries emails to DMB customer service and NEVER received a response. So disappointing. I KNOW others have experienced this drying out effect and IT NEEDS TO BE FIXED. What a waste of money.  No more Colorfix until something changes.  So freaking frustrating....

name: civ2ru
title: I didn’t care for it, please don’t hate me! :-)
text: To be fair, I can completely see why so many MUAs swear by this product! It is quite literally paint for their artist palettes. Once placed, it does not crease or budge, faithfully staying put until you’re ready to take it off. For everyday natural woke-up-like-this look though, I found it a little harsh and flat. There isn’t any softness, subtleness or dimension to it. Plus, it doesn’t play all that well with other eye color products. This is raw pigment, bold to the extreme – completely matte or insanely metallic or outrageously glossy – with bold shades to boot (nothing “nude”, understated or dreamy). So, if you’re going for that fierce single wash of color, or editorial of-the-moment glossy eye, get ready to pull out your arsenal of brushes, mix shades together and go for it – you will be in love. But for me, I’ll keep looking.

name: bramsay
title: Beautiful
text: They last all day, and show up true to color on any skin tone. They dry down fast though so you need to work quickly.

name: LisaMarieDennis
text: Alien is the first colorfix i bought almost 1 year ago and it is still my favorite lid topper or all over eye look! I have almost half of DM colorfix collection now and I love them all!!! Super long wearing and doesn't crease on my oily eye lids. First photo is of alien on its own and second photo is a glossy eye using her Glaze formula.

name: Bink1026
title: Lovely. HUGE color payoff
text: Holy color payoff! A little goes a long way on this product ladies and gents! I have light with neutral undertone skin with blue eyes and brown hair. The creme brule shade is the perfect monochromatic look for eyes, cheeks and lips. It  is so good! I feel like it doesn't last *as* long on the cheeks for some reason but on the eyes and lips, they last quite a while. Not totally transfer proof but it'll stay there until you're ready to take it off. Would love to give the glazes a try

name: AdriallRose
text:
Review is for Nebula. Sephora won’t allow me to choose Nebula- 

Holy Crazy Glue hold. Unlike the regular matte shade I have- Exposed- this does not crease or move once put on BUT it does dry down super fast. I put some on the back of my hand to dab from but it turned solid in a matter of seconds. So I put it straight on my finger and applied. Less is more at first. 

Wow! This is sparkly. I love throwing it over my matte shades for a really quick party eye. I’m terrible at eyeshadow so these products have been fantastic to get into that world while having 0 talent. The glitters are big and small so there are some craft glitter sizes thrown in there along with some small shimmers- so it’s got a lot of shine to offer. 

My only thing- There is no fallout from this BUT if you accidentally get some glitter where you don’t want it you better believe it’s not going anywhere.

name: dotinfla
title: The BEST cream e/s on the planet
text: Looking for a waterproof, smooth, easy to blend one/done e/s???? You’ve FOUND it!!  Every shade is super smooth, the matte formula is opaque and the metallic finish does NOT contain ANY glitter, thank heavens.  Not only is Color Fix easy to apply, with ZERO creasing and doesn’t cling to dry areas, it also magically minimizes the texture on my “mature” lids.  Tried Exposed first, adored it so got Romance (pink metallic) which has a lovely sheen if blended a bit but if not, an almost foiled finish, that yes, looks great even on “mature” eyes. Ballerina is another awesome shade with a very unique finish (satin metallic) that’s more “pink” than Romance and great for a one/done look (as are all 3) and they STAY PUT.  They do dry down rapidly so apply/blend fast but can be layered even if the bottom layer is completely set.  I’ve searched a few years for the perfect cream e/s and this is IT (better than Tom Ford, seriously).  Will likely be great on cheeks/lips too.

name: jglamm
title: Dream Lids
text: Oil Slick is the eye gloss of my dreams. If you want a one and done, sexy, smudgy eye this is for you. Definitely don't recommend it for those who like precision lines and cut creases.  My lids are darkly pigmented so it just works. This, some kohl in the waterline and mascara .. BAM!  It is a gloss, so I can see where some may not like it on their lid, but I found it to be light and not annoying. I personally wouldn't want to use a primer under it.  It also worked beautiful with a pigment I have tapped on top, but it doesn't really need a boost. Definitely will be beautiful on a hot, summer night. I have not tried it yet on my lips or checks, but I will say definitely put a tiny, TINY dot on your hand or working palette before you go in. You don't need a lot, and can be build up a bit.

name: emmeliza
title: Amazing
text: Very bold and you only need a little. It’s so lovely, colour is amazing. Make sure you have some serious remover though because it’s challenging to take off

name: aud723
text: This has amazing reviews so not sure why it didn’t work for me. When I tried applying alien over her matte shade exposed it took off the matte shade underneath. I tried it w my smallest finger and a small synthetic brush and it literally removes the layer underneath despite waiting for the matte layer to dry. It is also way too sparkly for me. It’s almost like clear w just some rose gold sparkles. Not happy with it at all. I don’t know how anybody gets this to work.

name: melissameier99
text: I never write reviews but this might be my new favorite product.  Perfect for lips, eyes and cheeks, lasts all day.  Definitely buying more colors!

name: kougar91
title: Just buy it!
text: I bought Rocket and 2 others and OMG! Absolutely beautiful, stunning! They dry down beautifully, I honestly want to buy all of them. Support this brand, you will not be disappointed! There is nothing like this!

name: helentiffanycee
title: IM BLOWN AWAY
text: I didn’t expect it to be such a small tube, but it’s SO pigmented that each time I only need a tiny amount for my eyes cheeks AND lips so I know this will last me foreverrr. The shade “latte” is so universal and flattering, if you don’t know which shade to get I would recommend getting this first! It blends well with fingers which is a plus. It lasts 12+ hours even when I wear a mask. This is a phenomenal formulation.

name: Jetlouisey
title: WOW!!!!
text: Dang this product is beautiful. As soon and I got product out of the bottle I was impressed! Easy to put on and blend and it’s just stunning on! This color could look nice on the skin too I think, but I’ve only worn it on my eyes so far. Seriously impressed ! I will probably buy more shades.

name: HoneybabyEve
title: I love my Colorfix. You can't go wrong.
text: I was soooo lucky to be introduced to Colorfix last year. I've started my collection. All you need a drop that get the color. They are so pigmented. Needless to say, I still have the ones I got last year. I can use as eye shadow, blush or lipstick.  If I want shine, then I always use the clear glaze on top of matte colorfix once it dries. It last all day. Thank goodness I love my Colorfix. I just purchased the new glazes from Sephora and they arrived ved yesterday.  Can't wait.

name: Deirb
title: Dries out QUICKLY
text: I really love these products.  They are beautiful and fun.  But many do not even last 6 months before completely drying out.  It's so frustrating especially when you want to collect a few colors at once.  I had to throw out 6 of them because I couldn't even get it out of the tube itself to even try to revive it with inglot.  They need to either tweak the formula or get a better packaging to give it more longevity.  As much as they are beautiful, I won't be buying anymore until they do changes because otherwise i'm just flushing my money down the drain.

name: DollfaceDredie
title: Sets like a dream!
text: The color fix is a MUST HAVE for any makeup artist, or anyone really. It does just what it says. It absolutely lifts any shade beautifully. I enjoy creating custom colors with this formula, and this pure white formula is just that. It layers beautifully on deep skin as well. Quick tip: be sure to work in layers for more opacity. Just like any paint, let your first layer set before applying another layer. But you will get very rich opacity even on your first layer. My favorite is creating a custom lilac shade using fruit punch, cobalt and adding a touch of lift. I use them on lips, cheeks, eyes and everything in between. I have over 15 shades and I intend to carry the whole collection! These set beautifully, you don't even have to apply powder on top, but eyeshadows also layer like a dream if you wish. In my opinion, lift is best used directly on the skin (no primer)! #dmbangels

name: Jay0319
title: Amazing for MUA’s
text: I’m a professional makeup artist and have about 10 of these. BUT for my kit the ones I use are the primary yellow, primary blue, primary red, black, and the white one. So I can create any color I could possibly want from just these 5 shades. These are a MUST HAVE for my kit. I can use them as eyeshadow, eyeliner, lipstick, blush, etc. Anything! They make me feel so prepared for any job. You want a green lipstick? I can do that. Yellow eyeliner and purple brows? Easy. I just love these so much! Such a wonderful formula and easy to work with. I also got the clear glaze to use to create glossy lips or glossy eyes. Highly recommend these. If you are not used to using a liquid as an eyeshadow you’ll need a little practice but amazing products! And you get a lot for your money, a little goes a long way. So happy to see her brand at Sephora!

name: OctoPrincess
title: Can't Rave Enough
text: Been purchasing from Danessa Myricks beauty for a while now. This was my first product from the brand, as recommended per Hannah Louise Poston on YT. It truly is the sparkliest eyeshadow product I own. great for a one and done look or over a look you just want to bring some BAM to. Layers well over a full eyeshadow look (primer, mattes, glitter primer, metallic shadows, etc.). Extremely user friendly. I'm not much for gold shadow, love my cool tones (green, purple, blue) but the silver tone in this gold-ish shade works so well with cool tones, as well as the occasional warm tone look. The foils are where it's at with sparkles though. I have the matte black which I use as liner often, or a black 'base' for duo/multi chrome shadows. Also the shade 'Alien' is insane, also a foil. 'Cosmic' is also a black foil that's stunning but very dramatic and intense. Buy these as gifts for all my friends that wear makeup, even if they aren't into makeup like I am. Never ceases to blow minds.

name: Mellmars1185
text: This stuff is a dream! It goes on smooth and creamy. I spread product with my finger and buffed out with an eye buffing brush. It is definetly buildable and it is a nice light colour so a good base to build on. I have oily skin so the matte option is perfect for me. I bought in 'Clear' and 'Alien' and will report back on those. The fact that this is multi use for cheeks and lips is new and innovative with all of the shades.  The tiniest amount goes a long way

name: sydneynoels
text: "Rocket" is such a beautiful shade. Its texture lies somewhere between a metallic foil and a glittery shadow. It lasts a very long time without budging!

name: Lovetrenice
title: I love these products!!
text: As a makeup artist. To find a product that is multi use is a DREAM! I love everything about the fact I can use it on my eyes, lips, and cheeks. I love that just this one tube packs a lot of product but doesn’t take up a lot of space, and I love that a little goes a long way. Definitely a must have!!

name: Brittanykmua
text: A multi function makeup product that I absolutely love!!! This product is versatile for eyes, lips and face!! You cannot go wrong with this prodcut.

name: AdriallRose
title: Beautiful color but sinks into creases
text:
Exposed is a lovely putty/earthy color that looks so good with brown eyes and pale skin. I throw on some mascara and my eyes look done. I could see putting a topper on directly in the center or using golds or amber shades with this. 

This shade is a slightly warmer shade of Fenty’s Mocha match stix that I use for contouring. 

My one complaint is that I have slightly hooded eyes and the product gets dissolved where my skin folds or pulls in the product. I have to pat it out usually anytime I look in the mirror so the wear time isn’t rock solid there. 

But I will buy another shade because they are so fun!

name: IslaCarys
text: I saw Katie Jane Hughes using Milky Way once and it caught my attention. Such a good foil that catches the light! It’s stunning.

name: bramsay
title: Chestnut, Nebula, Dessert Rose, Alien
text: These are amazing. The formula is super pigmented and true to color. They dry down really quickly so you need to move fast, but they last ALL DAY without fading or smudging. A little goes a long way, so you shouldn’t use too much at a time. It’s better to build up the color. Especially with the foils. I put too much on the “Alien” swatch and you can see they start to ball up a but if there’s too much at once without letting the layers dry down. I thought these would be hard to use but I was pleasantly surprised at how easy they were to blend and layer.

name: MarieofMars
title: Purchased with my own money
text: amazing for oily lids that crease a lot. I bought the Primary Yellow and Primary Red. The red is a true red however the yellow is more of a mustard which I prefer.

name: teeonmakeup
title: ❤️ Colorfix
text: I love all of the colorfix colors. They are very versatile and can be used as eyeshadows, blush and lipstick. Whatever you need!

name: k3ndr0aaa
title: The best!
text: Omg I loved this product. Works so well with my deep skin tone for blush or a cute lip! Buying every color!

name: Coco818
text: I'm obsessed with my Colorfix!!! The colors are everything and last day.

name: Susieqx
title: Here's the trick
text: Absolutely love these. This is the way I like to use them. I have blackout and lift and I mix them with my complexion products (concealer, foundation, bronzer etc) lighten or deepen a shade without changing the pigment color. I even use it on lipsticks or blush. It works amazing, try it for yourself. That way, if you have something that is the right tone, but you just want it a little darker or lighter, you have a simple fix. As an added bonus, colorfix is very long-lasting and will extend the wear of the base product. Happy mixing! :)

name: beckyshah
title: love!
text: I love Danessa Myricks colorfix! I have some of the metallic, foil, and glaze colors. They are stunning and they actually last on the eyes. You can use colorfix for anything. Want sparkly gold brows? Colorfix! I use them to make natural, glowy looks, but they can also create bold artistry. Get it! You will not be disappointed!

name: gabbyfishermua
title: Budge proof, versatile color!
text: Colorfix is a makeup artist's dream. If you want to create a bold opaque eye, vivid liner, or budge proof primer then you will LOVE this product. I use this on photo shoots and on myself daily and there is no product like it on the market.

name: ladida22
text: The Foils are so stunning. They start off a little sheer at first, but they build up nicely once you let her first layer dry. I love the way it looks layered on top of the mattes.

name: ladida22
title: PIGMENT!
text:
if you’re looking for pigments you will not be disappointed. The Mattes have a lovely soft velvet finish to them. 
Watch out,they do dry quite fast! so pls apply one eye at a time.

name: ruthless
title: Fantastic product terrible packaging
text: I own this and many other shades , the tubes dry out within three months and you need 244 fluid to rescue them. I had one tube arrive already dried out! This isn’t a new issue either.

name: stephlifebeauty
title: Beautiful finishes but they dry out quickly
text: I absolutely love the color fix pigments. I have about 10 shades across the matte, metallic, foil, and glitter shades, and the finish of all them is really beautiful. They are super blendable and pigmented, and I have no issues with these lasting all day (even without a primer). I don't think you can go wrong with any of the shades! One downside is that one of mine (Celebration) is starting to dry out a little bit after 6 months of using it, and I have heard of this happening to other people. I would recommend these if you know you are going to use them often otherwise they will dry out fairly quickly compared to other cream eyeshadows.

name: KJMbeauty
title: Beautiful Products
text: Beautiful product!! Amazing pigment and long wearing.

name: NerissaAP
title: Colorfix changed my perspective.
text:
Colorfix had a learning curve for me personally but let me tell you. It’s worth the experimenting!! I love that it’s waterproof and stays put. But it’s not only the formula that I love, I love the fact that it’s the product that really allowed me to experiment and try new things. You can mix colors to get the color that YOU want- I hardly use just one Colorfix without mixing it and it’s always so satisfying. Colorfix has definitely helped me broaden my perspective and use of product. 
Also, if you love glitter, you’ve got to try the foils/metallics. It’s liquid that dries down and stays put. NO FALLOUT. Brilliant. One of my absolute faves is Nebula. A gorgeous gold glitter. Can’t wait to get more!

name: BeautyandQueers
title: Versatile and easy to work
text: I cant believe we will have now on Sephora! I love all Colorfix they are amazing to work, so many options and versatility!

name: marianadae
title: The go-to product
text: This product is HEAVENLY! A little bit does the trick. My “go-to” is CELEBRATION. On fair skin it looks so great on the eye and super easy to apply. And I can rest assure that it will last me all day long. You can pretty much get ready to purchase every shade. I did!

name: andrewdahling
title: A MUST!!!!
text: This product is everything to me! I am a pro mua so yeah versatility the blend-ability and the crazzyyu staying power are why I love this product so much! For the peeps who just do their own makeup, don’t be intimidated by it, this can be EASILY used as eyeshadow blush or lips, or even brow tint if ya nasty! You will instantly fall in love I swear, you have to force this stuff to come off otherwise it’s there sitting pretty all day! It’s a must, I’ve been using it forever and there it TRULY nothing like this on the market! Throw it in your makeup bag travel and use a couple shades for a whole lewk, everyone will be wondering what you have on!!

name: Tutilicious
title: Perfect contour shade for fair skin tones
text: I have a fair skin tone and I use this shade to contour my face, it's spotless!!

name: danielleex0o
text: This product is a MUST have for a makeup artist and really any beauty enthusiast. This product is designed to once it’s really dry you can go over the color on the bottom. So that makes it ideal for working on a shoot or if you mess up your makeup and want to go over it. The color payoff is amazing. It’s so quick to use when your in a rush! I have every color!  In the pictures I’m posting I went from a plum look to the yellow orange look using these products in minutes!!

name: Scoobydoo1031
text: I have used a lot of different shades of this product and they are amazing! Lightweight, beautiful finish, and long lasting. The amount of different shades is amazing and always ready for any outfit or season!!!! Love love love

name: Nakiyajenkins
text: Colorfix is super easy to use and a little truly goes a long way. It’s super nice to finally find a shade that matches my skin and I can wear my shade of nude

name: anniefab
title: Stunning gold !
text: Love this beautiful color! It Adds such a beautiful shimmer to any look! All the colorfux fools are stunning!

name: anniefab
title: Versatile color!!!
text: This is one of my favorite colors were lip I and chic it is so versatile! The formula is amazing!!

name: scottielynx
title: Hands down my fave makeup product of the moment
text: I use Colorfix for just about everything! As eyeshadow, lipstick, brow color, contour, blush, you name it! I've been obsessed with using liquid and cream shadows over the last year. Not only because it's more sanitary for a makeup artist (i can just squeeze a little out onto a metal palette and never have to touch it again vs having to dip back into a powder eyesahdow), but also because I can mix and customize any color i want! It's a painter's dream! I do have to say, there is a small learning curve. Like I said, it's like painting if you are an artist. You have to work quickly and use very little product and slowly layer it for intensity. And the best thing? I never have to worry about cleaning up fallout!

name: Ronytaggar
title: Easy to use, Great color for anything
text: i don't use allot of makeup, but this product is so easy to use, i just love it!!

name: hausofponce
title: Game changer
text: Let me start by just saying there is nothing like this product on the market the versatility and longevity of this product It’s like no other this product could be used On your eyes your cheeks your lips and these is a big game changer because no matter where you place it always look flawless It comes in many different textures to create a different finish but once the product sets its on all day but what makes it even more special if you have enough play time to get a flawless blend this product it’s a game changer for the beauty industry whether you are a every day makeup person or a pro on the go

name: 50Matty
title: Awesome Product
text: I was nervous at first but was amazed on how easy it was to use. I only need a little bit on my hand.

name: ChaChaPimPim
title: Been using ColorFix - It is a must have!
text: Nice to see ColorFix is here. I am a user!!! I love the Color "Magnetic" for my eyes.  All you need is a little dot, a little goes a really long way--It does not crease.   For my pinky glow, I use "Venus" on my cheek and lips and add a drop of "Glaze" for the extra shine.

title: Long wearing high shine gloss!
text: Gloss with refects! I use this on the lips with a bold eye or on the lids to amplify the shades and contrast! Amazing formula , lasts a long time without a sticky feeling unlike other glosses I have tried in the past. I highly recommend the clear glaze too.

title: Unique beautiful shade
text: By far one of my favourite colorfix shades! So striking in colour so can be really amplified or make for the perfect glam.

title: Beautiful
text: Amazing universal product! Ballerina is a beautiful metallic pink for the eyes lips and face!

name: chelseamariemua
title: Theeeee best product ever !!!!
text: As a makeup artist these products are my holy Grail !!! These multi-use colofix are perfect for eyeshadow, brows, lips , cheeks , literally everything !!! They are so light wight and make my job so much easier not to mention the pigment and longevity is out of this world !!!! As an everyday makeup wearer these products make my daily routine so much quicker to get ready in the morning you need very tiny drop because a little goes a very long way !.

name: Tutilicious
title: GORGEOUS!
text: I adore this product, it literally has the most beautiful metallic chromatic shift I've ever seen. I love putting it on top of so many eyeshadow colors! It's a must have

name: andramaekup
title: Obsessed with Color Fix!!
text: Obsessed with Color Fix!! A staple in my pro makeup kit, I highly recommend this product. Color fix can do EVERYTHING. It’s my favorite liner, lipstick, blush and eyeshadow all in one. Can’t go wrong with a multipurpose, highly pigmented, long wearing product. Trust me when I say you will love it!!

name: SatyaL
title: Favorite product!
text: As a pro Makeup Artist of 20+ years, Danessa Myricks Colorfix is one of the most innovative products I've ever seen. It's pure pigment in a cream for eyes, cheeks, lips, face that is waterproof, long wearing, blends easily and it's simply magical! It comes in many colors, but I usually custom create the colors I want. I also use it as a base to intensify powder products. One of the coolest things is the Colorfix Glaze, which is a glossy product you can layer on top of other Colorfix or powder shadows that does not crease. So, you can achieve that wet editorial eye or glossy lip that stays in place. Clear Glaze is a must have!

name: FernandaaC
title: Colorfix is revolutionary
text: I absolutely love Colorfix! It literally changed my life and the amount of time I spent doing my makeup because this product can be used on your entire face as your lipstick,your blush, contour eyeshadow...

name: allanface
title: OBSESSED!!!
text: I am addicted to Danessa Myricks products but especially the cream pigments!!!  I love to mix them to create my own colors!  They are so beautiful on with different finishes and textures. It’s my go to for red carpet looks and editorials!  I’m so excited it’s available at Sephora!!!

name: EmilyRoth
title: Save Your Money & Do Not Buy!
text: Chalky, dry, and breaks apart. I have purchased this product before and would not recommend. I am surprised by the number of five star reviews already on this product to be honest, because I know that a lot of other people share my sentiment.

name: DianaEssence
title: The best orange ever!!! Color of happiness!!!
text:
This is one of my most favourite colorfix colors.
I think this is an amazing orange, works perfectly on eyes, on lips and cheeks.
The product is waterproof, 24 hours wear and works well with other products!!
One of my favourite ways to use it, is to apply in waterline! It looks magical!!!
Finally, you will need just one drop to create a whole eye look. This is very pigmented!!

name: Marvelann
title: The best product on the market
text: The colorfix formula is truly like nothing else. I absolutely love every color I've ever bought and how customizable these all are.

name: DianaEssence
title: The best liner ever!!!!
text:
OMG!!! So, first of all, this product is waterproof and 24 hours wear!!!  It has a creamy consistency and very blendable. 
Second, I need to add, that you can use this as an eyeliner, you will forget about all other eyeliners in the market!!!
Finally, you can apply this product and apply the colorfix in shade Clear or any other Glaze on the top of it and it will not move!!! It will stay there! This product is a life changer!!! In one word, THIS IS THE BEST!!!!

name: abigalesonline
title: MAJOR MUST-HAVE
text:
Colorfix is the hero product that I always wanted, but could never find, until now. Colorfix is a perfect mix betweeen an eyeshadow and a liquid liner to delivery a high quality, long lasting, opaque color experience. Anyone from beginners to experienced professionals will be blown away by this formula!

My top Colorfix picks: Primary Yellow, Blackout, Lift, Primary Blue, Beaches, Goldmine, and Clear Glaze.

name: danielleex0o
text: STAPLE COLOR! This is a must have. I'm a bridal makeup artist and I use this color on every single bride. Eyes, Cheeks, Lips. It doesn't budge! One of my favorite products!

name: eunicekristen
text: I love this product so much. It’s so multipurpose, I use it for blush , eyes and lips! A little goes such a long way. I must have for sure

name: JasmyneElise
title: YES Venus!!!
text:
Colorfix is amazing...PERIOD!
Not only is it waterproof and doesn't move throughout the day, but the color Venus is the perfect color for my everyday pinky look. I can use it on my eyes and cheeks and be on my way!

name: gkarpinmua
title: Colorfix is magic in a tube!
text: An absolute must have for every beauty lover and pro makeup artist! Colorfix changed the game. Very highly pigmented, waterproof, and long-wearing!  I use this product for every single makeup I create.  Magic in a tube!

name: Gottaglow2
text: Such a versatile product! An absolute MUST in every makeup kit!

name: 1000attempts
title: Been loving Ms. Myricks' products
text:
I purchased Latte and Exposed (matte), Glacier (metallic) and the Clear Glaze this past Christmas.
The mattes are extremely pigmented and I add just a small dot on my hand then apply with a firm (flat shader for example) brush, one eye at a time. I blow out the edges with a fluffy eye brush and it's a one and done. 
It dries quickly and stays put!
I've used these on my lips but have not been brave enough to use on cheeks, you have to work quickly with this product.
But it does what it says!
The clear glaze is best for editorial purposes and will crease the product underneath. If you let (for example) the matte shade dry and then apply the clear glaze over top, patting on with a more densely packed brush (I use a flat shader brush), it will last longer.
Happy to have these products available at Sephora soon. I'll be buying more.
I also have her Vision Flush in Tiara and Illuminating Veil in Serenity.

name: LEJones
text: Part of what I call my Danessa Myricks summer trio. I’m super busy so I like a quick and easy face while at the  same time looking chic and all made up on the run. I use this for my eyes, lips and just a little on the cheeks along with her illuminating veil highlighter and a brighter highlighter for my t-zone  and tip of my nose. Ladies!!!! When I tell you, INSTANT FACE !!! Super easy.

name: nicolebeauty
title: H O L Y  G R A I L
text: As a pro makeup artist, I am constantly looking for new products to add to my freelance kit. I recently tried these out, and I have used them every single day since. I have about 20 shades, and I can say with full certainty that if you are someone who is looking for multipurpose products that pack a punch, these are them. You can use the Colorfix on the eyes, cheeks, lips, however you’d like. They dry quick so you definitely need to work fast, but honestly, I cannot recommend them enough.

name: LDMUA
text: Exposed is amazing on the lips and eyes. Cool toned beige that isn’t too grey or too yellow is so hard to find. This is a staple in my regimen. I love it as an eyeshadow base. It’s also a great contour on fair to medium skin. Use sparingly! A little goes such a long way.
